author: Pamela Lee Thompson
title: earbuds stopped working after a month
content: I was really disappointed with these earbuds. I bought these a few months ago they worked at first and now they don’t work at all. They sound quality became terrible and I would have to hold the middle button to hear anything. I also bought another type of their earbuds and they sent me the wrong model. I am very disappointed.

author: Hilary n
title: WAY too heavy: they cause pain and fall out easily
content: The sound quality with these are great, but unfortunately the headphones are so heavy that they fall out petty easily and hurt your ears after only a few minutes of wearing them. Sad because they really do sound great.

author: Gregory Barker
title: Durability is good
content: I have used the ear buds every day for the last few months during my aerobics workout.  The buds are comfortable and comes with different size rubber ear inserts.  The cable is sturdy and does not tangle or knot-up.  The sound quality is very good

author: Amazon Customer
title: Good Pair, Good Price
content:
I bought these on a whim cause they were like $20, and these are way worth it. The music quality is on par with competitors like skullcandy and they are my go to headphones now. I will probably buy again if i am ever in need.

My only complaint is that the metal wiring on the side can stick out. It makes the edge a little rough and can possibly prick your finger.

author: newcamper
title: Amazing, Best Headphones Ever
content: Love these. They're not only aesthetically pleasing but the sound quality is awesome. Highly recommend! Best headphones I've ever had.

author: Ugo Nwafor
title: Nice Sound but earbuds kept falling off.
content: The quality was decent. The sound was really good. But I had issues using it because the earbuds kept falling out of my ears. It was very annoying and I tried so hard to deal with it for a while but two months in, I gave up and bought a wireless pair of speakers. Also, it was marketed as tangible free... well, that's false advertising. While it's not the worst, it is definitely not tangle free.

author: El Mi'kmaq Lobo
title: My new favorite
content: I love skullcandy but these may have overtaken them in the wired department for me, the sound is better than expected.

author: KFre
title: I've had these since the middle of September
content: The only reason I put 4 stars instead of 5 is because the material/metal part easily gets caught on my sweaters or pillow case. It had little pieces sticking out, I easily fixed this with small pliers but it would have been better if this wasn't a problem at all. The sound is surprisingly great for the price and I can tell that these will last me for some time. It's not at all flimsy like I thought it would be!

author: Rob
title: Dead in less than 2 months. Replacement came defective. Uncomfortable.
content:
This product is advertised as quality, but even with proper care they dont last 2 months. Past the return window as well.

Update, so I was able to get a replacement, but those came defective. Not very comfortable, and they came with foam tips that started falling apart and ripping apart inside of my ear after a single days use. Do NOT buy these headphones if you're looking for quality, comfort, or durability

author: Solbreeze
title: Clean Beautiful Sound!
content:
These Headphones are fantastic! The sound is crisp, clear, bright with bass for such a small earbud headphone.
The only drawback is the volume controls are not compatible with iPod Classic but otherwise seem to work fine with current cell phones and tablets.  Great value for the price, highly recommend them!

author: J H Mitchum
title: Excellent product for a reasonable price.
content: A reasonable priced set of ear buds that work great on both my iPad and on my HP PC. Base response is fine and noise canceling is good. Microphone and volume control work. A good choice for wired ear buds.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Expectations surpassed by leaps and bounds.
content: I bought these as a replacement to my iPhone earbuds that broke. I wasn’t expecting much because the cost was so reasonable, but I was quite impressed. I really feel as if these headphones do a better job of noise cancelling than the stock phone buds I was used to.

author: CaliBurito
title: Good bass and budget headphones
content: Good heavy bass that i like with clear sound quality/minimal distortion that usual bass heavy speakers have. The wires are on the fragile side though.

author: G-Man
title: Great earbuds for a great price.
content: The first music I listened with these buds was Dark Side of the Moon. WoW! I heard sounds I hadn’t heard before with these buds. Sound is crisp and clear with excellent stereo separation. Bass is good but doesn’t overwhelm the music. Buds that cost much much more can’t beat these. They also look cool. All for $20.99. Buy these you won’t be sorry.

author: T-fred
title: Not comfy. Bad sound. No bass.
content: I read many reviews that stated these have incredible sound and crazy bass. While these do get incredibly loud, it is a very tinny sound and gives me a terrible headache. There really is no bass to speak of. I know they are inexpensive but with all the hype i expected better. Lesson learned. the metal housing is large, in some cases larger than the tips that are included, and they hurt my ears shortly after I put them in. I would not suggest you buy these.

author: Christopher J. Chumbley
title: Great Sound. Very Rugged.
content: Great product. Excellent sound. Very rugged. I sleep with mine in and I am pretty hard on headphones. The cord and connections are very good.

author: Minimalist
title: Good sound quality, low quality construction
content: Surprisingly, they sound fantastic for the price.  The construction is very low quality though and I don't suspect they will last long.

author: Nelly L.
title: Awesome
content: Absolutely love these. Super good quality

author: Tess
title: Amazing quality, minor issue
content: The cord is amazing quality. I haven’t had a single issue with it. My cat doesn’t even like chewing on it. The only thing I don’t like is how the shape of the earbuds are. It’s cylindrical, and hard so it can hurt ears sometimes. I can’t sleep without headphones so I use these. The sound quality has been amazing since I got it and they’re generally comfortable apart from the shape. If they rounded out that back side it would be absolutely perfect. So yeah if the creators read this, that’s my hint. Make them a bit more comfortable and you have stunning headphones with great bass and sound locking.

author: verd12w
title: Good sound but I'm not sure about durability
content: The sound quality was good but the jack broke after just a couple days. It could be a fluke, but I'm honestly kinda scared to try again.

author: Devin Reimer
title: The earbuds are SHOCKING! (Not in a good way)
content: I have worn these earbuds occasionally over the past 5 months and have had an overall well experience with them.  ALTHOUGH, about 2 months ago I started to realize that they were occasionally putting off electricity and was SHOCKING THE INSIDE OF MY EARS.  I have never gotten them wet or have dropped them.  I will be finding an alternative soon.

author: Thalia
title: If you have small ears like myself do not buy. Otherwise great quality earphones for the price!
content: This is an excellent quality pair of earphones. I made the mistake of purchasing this because I have very small ears and I hate the fact that I have to stick the buds in all the way (painful) in order for it to stay in. Don’t get if you have small ears. I use these as a backup, and my apple earphones as my daily.

author: K. Mantel
title: sturdy but flexible wires,  sound is best in comparison to  2 other brands I have
content: The outside end of the buds themselves can be a bit sharp around the ear, but they are sturdy.  The wires are long enough, flexible and sturdy enough to use while in bed and yet be able to set the phone or other electronic well away from the body.  Sound is the best I've found, comparing 2 other brands I have now and a myriad of lesser models I've previously thrown out. Would recommend these, for the price, are excellent!

author: BaltimoreActual
title: Exceptional quality, exceptional price.
content: For the price, you won't find a better in-ear  headphones. The sound quality is almost just as good as the in-ear headphones you might get with the  Samsung galaxy, for example. As far as aesthetics go they look great, with a gold metallic finish. They also include a very nice travel bag with numerous replacement ear pads of various sizes included a set of memory foam ear pads, which are really comfortable! One thing they could have capitalized on and didn't was the wire, some of their products I've seen have a nice breaded fabric cord and this model has a cheap see thru plastic cord.

author: Amazon Buyer
title: Just Ok, falls out of my ears
content: I needed Noise Insolating phones - the ones that you stick in your ear and do not hear noise. I work in my yard with power tools, mower and trimmer - very noisy. I wanted to listen to music and podcasts instead. Well, this thing works while it is in your ear. However, ear buds are not soft and because they are too stiff they fall out of my ears and I have to stop and put it back in. Annoying. Sound quality is good, but again it falls out in a few minutes if you do activities. If you just sit down maybe it won't.

author: Kathy_1954
title: Very clear
content: I like these headphones quite a bit. I’ve tried different hp that didn’t work so well, but these have a good sound and when I called my mom, she said she could hear me clearly.

author: Brian Serrao
title: GREAT SOUND!!
content: We are all caught up in the hope of purchasing items only by brand name, but these headphones can stand next to any of the big brand names which you end up paying a huge price tag. These guys work beautifully and totally isolate out the outside noise when you have them on. I would (WILL) be purchasing some of the other models available to see what else they have to offer. GREAT HEADPHONES.

author: apurewal
title: Awesome!
content: Very good sound and fit. Normally don't like headphones with the squishy end pieces because they don't stay in my ears but these came with different sizes so I could switch them out. Gets pretty loud without compromising any sound quality and the buttons work perfectly too. Love the little case it came with since it stops them from getting tangled up everywhere.

author: Gorngirl
title: Great sound! Did NOT last.
content: These earbuds sound great! Good bass response, comfortable feel, all good. Then... the right earbud just quit working. No break, no crackling like a short... just. Stopped. Working.  I’m so bummed. Of course, this had to happen a week after the return window date expired. I’m hoping to see if Betron will send me a new pair as clearly it’s a defect or something like that (I hope).

author: Matthew Ebelt
title: Best headphones for the Value
content: I have been using these for a few months now. These are by far the best headphones in this price range I have ever used. Very clear audio all around. Highly recommended. Mostly used for listening to audiobooks and youtube quality music havent listened to anything requiring bass.

author: Mr. Eddie S.
title: The perfect earbuds ever made
content: First of all I would like to say that these earbuds are superior. When first putting any earbuds in my ears adjusting them for bass quality has always been goal number one. With these, the sound quality was so imperior that adjusting them was not necessary. Sound way better than my beats headphones, even sound better than the apple earpods. I have yet to test them out on call quality. This is what listening to music should have been about in the very beginning. There is only one thing I would like to see and that is for these gems to have two mics to be in step with most phones of today that sports the dual mic. Other than that, these babies just can't get any better than they already are. Now I feel if though I am there when listening to music. Them being metal is a major plus.

author: ELG
title: Not Good
content:
I bought 2 pairs of these. They are packaged very nicely and appear to be of good quality. When I first used them the sound was decent and the play/pause/volume buttons operated normally. The hands-free mic also worked well for phone calls. Then the decline began in earnest.
The first pair malfunctioned after less than a month. The jack connection started to fail causing my iPhone to stop playback during movement. I threw them out and opened the second pair.
The second pair malfunctioned right from the box. The volume lowered, uncommanded and there was a crackling sound as if there was a loose connection. They have entered the garbage can next to the first pair.

author: Teressa
title: Really liked em for a month.
content: Sounded great but died really fast

author: Amazon Customer
title: They Slip Out Too Often
content: They won't stay in my ears.  I bought them to work out in but I haven't gotten the chance to work out in them and it's already a challenge to keep them in.  BTW, I have normal ears.

author: Eugene Z
title: Overall good.
content: Sounds great, however on one of the three that we bought back sticker fall a part 2nd day. see picture. Phones are still functional, despite...

author: Michael Rzemieniecki
title: You wont regret getting these!
content: The bass is good, the sound in general is really good. The wires and earbuds are sturdy. These are really great especially for the price. They come with a magnetic carrying case that was awesome when I was travelling on a plane. I recommend buying this fersure

author: Mo Hassan
title: Good sound but faulty tech
content:
The mic on these earphones are terrible on iPhone and MacBook Pro. Callers on the other side often complain there was a lot of noise or they couldn't hear me.

Also, for some reason the volume would decrease by itself if the wire got rubbed the wrong way.

Very disappointed.

author: C-Dub
title: Great devise for watching movies.
content: Is compatible with both of my Samsung devises (smartphone S9+ and Chrombook). Fits comfortably in my ear and really does block out external noise! I'm very happy with the headphones!

author: Michael Carroll
title: Its great....except
content: Love the look, feel and sounds, but left ear stopped working....

author: Melissa
title: Perfect for tuning your children out, you're welcome
content: It went in and out when I first used it..but after that, I couldn't hear anything over my dub step..if you want to tune your kids out..use these😁.. if you want to escape and be deaf, than purchase these. They lasted my friend 8 months.. submerged in water twice and an 8 year old...they are solid...

author: chunghan
title: Affordable Headphone with good quality
content: I bought this headphone for more than half a year ago. The headphone came with a nice package. The experience is pretty great with my smartphone and MacBook. Right now, perhaps the wire has some connection issues because my puppy chewed it, and sometimes it triggered my MacBook's Itunes accidentally. Thus, I purchase another Panasonic ErgoFit Earbud Headphone to avoid the situation. I feel the Betron's one has a stronger Bass effect and Panasonic's one has a cleaner voice.  One bonus point from Betron's one is it won't get tangled easily. It's a good headphone with a friendly price.

author: G Clarke Smith
title: They took a great product and made it bad
content:
My kids and I have all been using Betron in-ear headphones for the last year or more - they used to be affordable, durable with good sound and noise isolation.  Unfortunately they appear to have added a microphone/remote to all of the models, taking a good product and making it way below average.  In just 2 days I’ve had to deal with bizarre static every time I try to use the microphone and, if you wear them while moving around, the remote constantly and randomly changes the volume any time it brushes against your clothing (forget about using them on the treadmill, the volume changes constantly).

They used to make a great set of basic headphones with no remote or microphone - I hope they bring those back because the microphone/remote model is nowhere near as good.

author: The cutest mom
title: Great got movies 😊,  Stinks for Music 😔
content: ...I read a bunch of reviews before ordering...I must agree and disagree...Im not impressed with the sound quality when listening to music.  These headphones do sound great when watching a movie....but I listen to music more than I watch movies on my phone or mobile devices.  I did try these in 2 different phones and brands, the bass is horrible like barely existant and they have no levels or a round sound and the sound escapes so everyone can hear what you're listening to.  I also don't love how far they stick out of the ear.  I buy dollar tree headphones for my kids n the music through these sounds like those. I do own a pair of beats by dre pro headphones and  I definitely wasnt expecting that quality of sound but I did listen to the same songs on the same devices to ensure there was bass being output in the songs on the devices I tested with. Not sure if I got a dud but I just wasnt thrilled with the sound of music!  (Pun intended) If you are a movie watcher however they sound really good like surround sound good in the movie arena! If you listen to music like me,  keep shopping

author: alia
title: Finally a perfect earbud
content: The bass and sound quality give the pricey ones(they start with the letter B) a run for their money. I love everything about this product.I hear nothing around me,but my music..

author: Xavier m.
title: Damn good
content: Damn good headphones. I liked them so much I bought my father and my brother a pair. I loved the bass, the noise cancellation, and the overall smoothness of the sound. Everything was so crisp, neatly packaged, an overall amazing purchase. I strongly recommend. Some new colors would be nice though

author: John
title: It was a gift.
content: Bought these for my 13 year old granddaughter who was totally impressed with them.  I personally thought they looked and felt like a very high quality, well built earbud.  Am going to buy a pair for myself.

author: devern
title: Why the high reviews?
content: After just a few day the remote control stopped working (keeping in mind i dont use it much because i usually just use my overear headset. the sound quality is not bad but its nothing special. On the upside it does look good and does not tangle like other earphones.

author: Richard
title: Great sound quality for the price, an exceptional value!
content: Flew around the world with these in my carry on they performed very very well.

author: James D. Eskra
title: Unmatched design quality and sound
content: They are so beautifully made and boxed that it took me awhile to actually use them. What a waste of time! They sound a beautiful as the look! The sound quality is unmatched by any headphones I’ve ever used including the expensive Bose Quiet Comfort 35 II noise canceling over the ear headphones! The sound seems closer because of the earphone pads filling my ear canals. Every component part is of the design is of awesome quality!

author: A. Orr
title: Excellent Earphones with mic for iPhone 8
content: work very well.  noise cancelling is good.  calls come through clearly.  the remote & mic work great.  highly recommend these for wired earphones with an iphone 8.

author: KHilton
title: Best ear buds or head phones I've ever used!!,
content: Is there a place for six stars?  Folks, I've bought & tried several types of phones/buds the last few years.  These are undoubtably the best I have ever used.  Because I am deaf in one ear, I am unfortunately unable to hear stereo but the music to the one ear is crisp and clear!  There is no missing parts of any song that I can hear!  It nearly cancels out any outside noise like my wife watching TV.  I'll read and listen to my music.  You know the saying, "Happy wife, happy life!" The ear buds are so comfortable I have fallen asleep and never noticed the ear buds stillî in my ears!!  I can't speak to durability yet nor can I comment on phone compatibility because i doubt they will ever be used in such capacity.  But strictly to meet my needs: great sound, ease of use and comfort, I'd give it an A+!  For the price, it's well worth a trial!  You just might find one you like as well!!!

author: Lisa Ann Hein
title: Pleasantly surprised
content: Please all away around and good sound quality

author: M. Freeman
title: Crackling going on within connection!
content:
Love to design & they sound amazing if you can get past the fact that every time you plug them in they pop and crackle.
Supposably company backs up with one year warranty.
We'll see how it goes as time goes on.
Design and functionality are cool. The fact that a lot of people complaining about some of the same issues as I had right out of the box definitely shows these need Improvement.

So 3 stars from me.

author: Rico Hunnicutt
title: That bass though.
content: 1st day. They're worth every penny.

author: Mobius
title: Audio Quality is Terrible!
content: For the life of me I don't even know how these headphones have the positive reviews they do. They are the worst sounding headphone I have ever put in or on my ears. The treble is non existent, the mids greatly recessed and the bass boosted so high you might as well just listen to a sub-woofer.This is coming from a bass head, who listens to electronic music most of the time.

author: TayDre Photography
title: It is a special one!
content:
Everything is perfect except when the foam dissolves quick if alcohol is placed in it.
 I knew the cable for the handphones would've been an issue based on the material it is made from; plausible tanglesome and untanglesome n it's fragile so no tugging on the cord so hard. The other ear buds sizes feel weird n doesn't stick in your ears for too long when workout out or moving upper body section too much.

My headphones broke recently for the second time n it was over the same reason. It got tugged a few times as in grabbing it from my bag n pocket, however that was too much pressure for it. I thought I had lifetime warranty n apparently the person I bought it from removed me from contacting him/her. SMH 🤦🏽‍♀️

author: Amazon Customer
title: Good for the cost!!!
content:
Sound is perfect for $20. It’s not amazing in my opinion, but it’s really good for the cost. Has more bass than my Beats, but I wouldn’t go as far to say they are better. But being $20 and almost as good as $300 Beats, that’s a steal! You can hear when they are moved. They come with a small clip to prevent that. I purchased these since I live in a city right now and I figured out men harass me less when it looks like I can’t hear them. I didn’t want to wear my Beats around the city.

Update: I’m literally so irritated with these because they keep falling out of my ear. I tried both covers and they won’t stay in. Sound is still great. But I can’t listen without them falling out.

author: Laurie Harkins
title: Head phones
content: I love these

author: Amazon Customer
title: "Best Earbuds I've ever owned...at this pricepoint..."
content:
They sound GREAT...the microphone works and sounds well to other's I am speaking to and I like that the cord is just a little shorter than most other brand's. *(Less to tangle up...)

The other features also work as described...volume control, next song, pause the song and SIRI, all work with my iPhone.

I purchased these because I also purchased an iPhone 6S for posterity. I wanted an iPhone as an emergency back up phone for my iPhone XR. You never know when you might lose your phone, break your phone or just need Warranty work done.

author: Cameron
title: Decent while they last
content:
I really liked these headphones. They have a solid look and feel with metal casing. The sound is good for the price. The cable doesn't tangle easily. The volume controls are nice.

After about a month, one earbud stopped working intermittently. I figured I got a dud so I emailed support and they promptly apologized and sent a replacement. A few months later, I had the same problem with the replacement pair. These headphones have serious durability issues. Also, each earbud has a piece of wire mesh covering the sound hole which is poorly glued on and easily comes off after some normal use.

author: P. Jordan
title: Skip these.
content: The sound quality is decent, but cuts out if or when the wire is moved around while walking or running for example. Obviously cheaply made, but this is almost unusable.

author: Craig
title: Good sounding, not great.
content:
They are a $20.00 pair of earbuds. I use them on bike rides, the earbud is kind of big so you get some wind noise. The bass is ok, nothing more than ok. The plug is long, so its kind of cumbersome. On the otherhand the track advance and track repeat is very good feature.
Overall a ok pair of buds.

author: mikebison
title: Received them the other day and noticed a high frequent ...
content: Received them the other day and noticed a high frequent sound when they are in use. I plugged them into other phones and computers and the ear buds still gave off this high hiss. It is noticeable with no and low volume.

author: mamie
title: good quality
content: well packaged. good quality. yet the earbuds easily fall out.

author: V Nguyen
title: Then a few days ago it was getting worse. If the headphone is used neither party can ...
content:
I bought this Headphones about six weeks ago.  Two weeks ago it started acting up. Every time I use it I can hear the static during the conversation. Then a few days ago it was getting worse. If the headphone is used neither party can hear each other.
Bad product!

author: Kindle Customer
title: Good full sound at a reasonable price
content: Second pair of Betrons, got the first no tangle set about a year ago.  Had a problem with the set and warranty covered replacement within a year so when I needed a second set I bought Betron YSM1000 and am happy with the sound and quality.  I also own Beats wireless bluetooth headphones and V-Moda professional headphones but the Betrons are handy and fit most listening situations mostly movies and pop/rock music.

author: Kyle
title: Single ear bud dead
content: Single ear bud no longer produces sound after four months of use.

author: Rachel
title: Seem nice at first, then microphone controls malfunction soon after buying
content:
I really wanted to like these headphones. They look and feel sturdy, and have a very sleek design. The sound quality is also really nice, especially the sound quality of the bass. The buttons also feel fairly sturdy and secure, so they don't fall off like other brands' buttons.

My problem with these is that they just don't last! I've bought two pairs and both times, they deteriorated after like two months. Both times, the microphone and controls started going haywire really soon after I bought them. They either stop working altogether, or start making my phone do weird things like randomly turning on Google assistant or constantly pausing or skipping music. In the most recent pair, they've been emitting a lot of static for the past week or so.

author: Jimmie Hickson
title: Great quality at an affordable price.
content: To date, these are the best earphones I have purchased. The cushion designs of the earpieces make them comfortable for the ear.  I also like volume control feature of the device. Whether you have the right earbud in the left ear or left earbud in the right ear, you get the same level of sound quality. It should be noted, at the time of this review, I will be buying another pair. That’s just how impressed with these earphones.

author: TERRI MCCOY
title: Trash!
content: I had these for literally 11 days when one side of the headphones went out!  I am beyond pissed!.

author: Carol A. Salter
title: Great Headpones
content: My grandson loves his new headphones and uses them for gaming and for watching videos.

author: Byungjun Lee
title: Nice earphone, but sometimes tics electric pulse to my ear
content: This is a generally nice earphone to use. sound quality is good, low noise and good earbuds that can cancel external sounds. However, often when I am walking with this earphone the noise that earphone line shakes and hit my body is directly translated to my ear, and often I get some electric pulse into my ear which annoys me.

author: Caetlynn Booth
title: There are two differnt product here + Braekage
content:
To start with there are two different headphones being sold here.  One with 3 buttons and the together with no buttons.  So why are you selling them on the same page for the same price?  Just getting ride of inventory?

Second, The three button headphones lasted about  30 days then the left headphone stopped working.  For some reason I just don't get a sense of trust from this brand. Maybe they make some good  headphones in the UK.  But the ones I got were bad to break that soon.  The sound is Okay nothing amazing.  The earpieces I think are a little big and tend to want to fall out if you are moving.

author: A. R.
title: Heavy weighted so it does not stay in your ear.
content: Too heavy, seems like good quality but it doesn't stay in your ears when working out. I cant wear them while working out without constantly adjusting them.

author: Sean OConnell
title: Best ones I've had in this price range
content: I've owned quite a few and these are quite durable. I have to pull them out at work sometimes and then forget and walk around, which means they fall off my shoulder and smack the ground. 3 out of 4 others have died after 1 or two drops on the concrete. And....they sound great.

author: Lisa Marie C clark
title: UNCOMFORTABLE, HEAVY AND FALL OUT
content:
These are really bad headphones.  I was looking for a high quality pair of headphones for around $25 and decided on these only to be more and more disappointed every day.

They are definitely more concerned with style than comfort in the way that they are made and the last thing they are concerned with it fitting in one's ear properly.

They always fall out because of their poor design and weight.  I have tried to shove the back part of the bud into my ear to squeeze the headphones in and keep them in my ear.  Not only is this painful, but it also does not work.

I hate using these headphones.

author: Daniel Schillinger
title: Amazing Product For The Price
content: Ordered these headphones for use while i was at work. For the price they are absolutely outstanding headphones the far exceeded my expectations. My first thought was that being as they were so cheap they were going to fall apart fairly quickly but that was NOT the case. They have withstood some fairly rough abuse from me while at work the last few weeks and still work just fine. I would definitely recommend these to anyone and am even thinking about buying a second pair for myself for backup in case something happens to the ones i currently have!

author: Aries Keller
title: Very durable
content: I am cursed when it comes to headphones, usually managing to break them within a month tops, most often within a couple weeks. I've had these for over a month and a half now I believe, still going strong. Sound quality is great and the bass has some pretty decent punch for in - ear headphones.

author: Eve
title: Literally lasted me a month
content: Worked extremely well when I first got them. Now, I have to turn the volume up extremely high on my devices to be able to hear anything on the headphones.

author: Elia Exile
title: sound is quality
content: my son ordered two of these headsets by mistake, charging my account once and his cc as well. I was upset and told him to send the second back. After I heard how clear he sounded when I called him, i decided to keep the second set for myself.

author: Ishkey
title: Many great features durable & clear sound.
content: The fit for me is awkward, because they pop out. The shape of Apple headphones was better but the cords tangle and wear out. That’s why I bought these and they are MUCH better as far as  cords. I bought my daughter a pair and they do not pop out.

author: Peter K. M. Elijah
title: Earbud rubbers? No. Sound? Oh my word yes.
content:
Ok, here's the thing. For the price, the sound is excellent, the very good bass was unexpected. I messed around with the equaliser and my mind was blown. The metallic material feels surprisingly good coming from my wooden Symphonized NRG 3.0's.

HOWEVER! The surprising thing is that NONE and I mean NONE of the earbud rubbers fit my ears, not even the ones that came on the earphones. For me, the medium size works and it's been that way for my Sony extra bass, Skull Candy's, JBl's T110's, Anker sound buds slim and Panasonic headsets, medium works perfectly. None worked for the Bertrons. That was disappointing. Especially considering that I had to resort to my old buds from previous earphones (luckily I kept them all). Almost gave a three but the sound quality compensates if you have other extra buds.

Durability? Will update.

author: Daniel
title: low bass, keep falling from my ears
content: they had a really low bass sound, and are not very confortable.. it keeps falling from my ears. not realy noise-isolation at all.....They seem durable but I prefer the original iphone earbuds. I'll give them away and already order new iphone earbuds

author: Sean
title: Best headset around for $20 that are worth $100
content: Went from razer to these. I have had beats and other brands. To be honest I grabbed these for the great reviews and low price tag. I am impressed with the look and sound of these. I am very pleased. Thank you for a great product.

author: LK
title: Good sound
content: These are nice but big & heavy. They would work best for men. They don’t really fit in my feminine ears well & they seem to fall out no matter how tight I have them fitting into my ear canal. They do sound good

author: Amazon Customer
title: Already Broken (2 months)
content:
Pros:
Microphone works great
Very loud, only need to use the lowest volume settings
Good base

Cons:
Both sides mesh is already falling off (see photo)
There is a popping noise in the left earbud that makes it impossible to use
Audio is great for calls, terrible for music

Summary: Will not last long.

author: Mon
title: Gorgeous industrial design but faulty volume control
content: These are beautifully designed little earbuds. The hardware is really impressive and expensive looking and the little pouch they come with is a delightful touch. The sound quality is fine for my purposes, I intend to just use them for listening to podcasts. My beef with these is that the volume adjuster doesn't  work with my devices. On my iPhone it does nothing at all, and on my macbook it turns my volume only all the way up, or completely off.

author: Heavy Metal Chef
title: Second pair, love these.
content: My car ate my first pair. Love these.

author: Dan
title: Decently good headphones
content: They're pretty good. Only thing that sucks is that the mic doesn't work on my playstation controller. Only reason I bought them for lol

author: Gabriel Gordon-Harper
title: Great audio, but people tell me they hear an ...
content: Great audio, but people tell me they hear an echo when I am on the phone (though the echo seems only to affect people on the other end of the line, I have never heard it on my end.)

author: Andy
title: Echo feedback
content: I don't know if its me, but I'm getting a lot of echo feedback from this when my wife is using it on her phone to answer my calls, I'd speak, hear myself speak, and then hear her response.  Kind of strange considering the headphone and microphone are supposed to be separated?  I mean according to her it works well as a headphone with nice bass and multiple ear bud inserts to fit your ear, but as a handsfree headphone the echo feedback is very annoying.

author: E.B.
title: Great product, a little heavy
content:
Pros: Great sound, heavy bass (which I actually turned down using my music app's equalizer), noise cancellation is just okay, but the price for these were very impressive (I believe they were on sale for $13 when I bought them).

Cons: The weight, they are pretty heavy, and it's tough to get them to stay in my ear. One reason they might not stay in my ear well might just be the shape of my ear, but the weight definitely doesn't help.

Overall: Fantastic headphones for the price, and if I'm just sitting still at my desk, then they stay put for a long time, but other people might not have that problem. Definitely worth the price if they fit properly. :)

author: EngineGuy57
title: Good set of ear buds
content: These earbuds have a decent rich sound. The cord seems heavy enough and has a tangle free ability. Buds come with a self closing/squeeze opening pouch that make storage easy. I use these when i travel on long haul airplane flights and they feel comfortable even after wearing them for several hours.

author: Victor Vuong
title: Great headphones so far!
content: I like these headphones-their sound is good and will be useful if you want to listen to music before work or at the gym. I don't know much about the sound quality-they're probably not the best but these will work for any average person. Haven't had these long enough to comment on durability but they've been great so far! There are also multiple earbud covers of different sizes and a clip you can attach in case you want the earphones to stay in one place (very convenient when working out). Would recommend to anyone considering!

author: WillC
title: I order total of 3 of these earbuds.
content: These earbuds have a nice base. Last time I bought these earbuds it was cheaper.

author: Hourglass
title: Good quality product design, sound, and overall experience
content:
Decided to try these instead of Skullcandy, since I've been using the latter regularly for like 10 years and it seemed like time to try out something else.

I have to say, no regrets. Admittedly the gold color feels a little blingy, but the sound quality is better, the cables are more sturdy, and (while I recognize this may not be useful for everyone) the color makes them easier to find amidst the crowds of cables that live at home and at work for me.

Hoping to use this brand for another 10 years for sure!

author: Peter
title: Work Great but customer service is amazing
content: Great headphones. But the customer service is perfection. They handled my issue like a champ. I will definitely be a customer for life. Thank you

author: Izzy L.
title: Went through the washer, and still work!
content: They have a good sound! Very comfortable to wear for long periods. Not 100% noise cancelling, but blocks out most outside sounds. I love the pause/play and volume control buttons on the wire, very convenient.  But most impressive, these went through the washer and dryer (because I'm an idiot) and they still work just fine!

author: Melissa Sorentino
title: Amazing bass
content: These earbuds sound so amazing, best earbuds I've ever listened to, the bass is way better than what i was expecting. I'm recommending these to all my friends!! You will not be disappointed with these.

author: thesiege03
title: I LOVE THESE EARBUDS!
content: These are an amazing value, and I have three sets. The first set I bought are still working after going through A FULL CYCLE IN THE WASHER, and 25 MINUTES IN THE DRYER. Pulled them out and they work fine! I was dumbfounded. It just tells you these are tough. The sound is great, and I fully intend on getting more when needed! But, chances are that I'll have at least one of these sets til I croak! Get some :)

author: planokay
title: Great purchase
content: These are a great value and I liked the so much I purchased a second pair.

author: Amazon Customer
title: ... well i use them to talk on the phone great volume control i use them for everything
content: These earphones work very well i use them to talk on the phone great volume control i use them for everything.The packaging and quality is great  i would purchase again

author: D. Vanthof
title: Excellent sound quality
content: Excellent sound quality, look well made.  My daughter is very picky about her headphones, and she loves these things.  They fit her well, she's on the small side, plus the sound is so clear she keeps them at about 1/2 the volume of her previous headphones.

author: Hightechredneck
title: Sturdy but light on the bass.
content: Decent price for sturdy quality earphones.  Just a little short on bass.  Lots of bud choices but I would not count on them for "noise cancelling".

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great deal
content: Just a little to big for helmets

author: Moonwalker
title: Some good ideas but terrible design flaws.
content:
First , the good things:
1. Sound is decent for the price
2. Remote works well
3. Nice packaging

Now here are the problems that ruin it for me:

1. The earbuds sizes are all too big. Even the smallest size offered is not that different from the medium and large sizes. As a result they keep falling off my ears and never stay in place. That is also the case for the "memory foam" pair of earbuds. They are too big to begin with and after trying them out for 2 weeks, thinking they would shape nicely and become a snug fit, nothing. This rules out doing anything involving movement, even a light activity such as walking becomes problematic. Since I listen to music a lot going to the gym or walking in general, it quickly becomes annoying.

2. I sometimes experience a disconnection while plugged in my smartphone. This never happened to me with any other brand before. What I mean is that the earphones are plugged in, and all of a sudden the sound will stop coming from them, but from the phone's speaker, until I unplug/plug back in. I checked several times if it came from the phone or the connector, but I tried friends' ear/headphones, and didn't have any problem.

author: Helene B.
title: Earbuds are too big.
content: Great sound.  Only complaint isearbuds are too big and don’t stay in my ears.

author: Nisha Dan
title: Amazing material and sound quality
content: Great product! I've owned two pairs of these headphones now and can't say enough about the quality, especially for the price. The headphones come shipped in a very nice, foam insulated box with a small storage pouch and several different earbud sizes. They also provide a set of foam earbuds, in addition to their regular silicone. The bass on these is beautiful, similar to headphones that retail for 6-8 times the price of these.

author: AyJay
title: Crazy how inexpensive good earbuds are now
content: I bought these looking for a 'cheap' set to toss in my bag for the occasional moment my bluetooth Beats die out. So I'd been happy with so-so sounding as long as it set me back less than 20 beans. Couldn't be happier and was pleasantly surprised at the full, round sound. Bass is great. But be sure you experiment with the different silicon nibs. Sizing those right is the #1 reason your earbuds will sound too bassy, too distant or not full enough. This one came with 3 different sizes plus a pair of spongy ones. You have to try them all as it's impossible to know by sight which will extend your ear channel to best effect.

author: CMojica
title: Great Value
content: This is the 2nd pair of Betron headphones that I've purchased. I prefer the AX5s to the YMS1000s only because the back of the earbud is more ergonomic and less bulky. Both headphones have excellent sound/bass/fit, and the microphone is loud and clear which is hard to find even with much more expensive headphones. Betron is definitely the best value dollar for dollar and I would even take the Pepsi challenge with my $15 Betrons vs the $200 Beats I purchased for my wife. Keep it up Betron!

author: R. Lowe
title: good headphones - great price
content: I'm tired of spending $30 a pop for apple ear buds. These do very well as a substitute. Was concerned that the shape (different from earbuds) would lead to them falling out all the time  but,  in fact, they are just as secure as the ear buds ever were.

author: Michael E. Morgan
title: good phones for a great price
content:
I found the pods were more comfortable than expected and the clarity and quality of sound was hoped for and met my bar standard, so
I was happy with the quality. I would recommend these phones to anyone who would like a decent set of phones for a reasonable price.

author: Randy
title: Nice one and not expensive
content:
After many years with the earbuds from a well-respected manufactory/company, I was tired of it and looking for an alternative. I saw this one on Amazon with very high overall rating. I bought one pair to try out.
The build of the earbuds is very good. The sound initially was harsh and rough.  But after several days of burn-in, the sound quality improved significantly. The pair of earbuds I have has a quite nice mid-range, and the high-range is pretty clear and clean, while bass is fine.  Overall the sound quality is very good, in some case, is actually better than that of those cost me more than $60.  Considering the cost of the earbuds is around $20, I think it is good deal and totally worth the dollar, so I bought another pair for my wife.

author: Amazon Customer
title: worst headphone I've bought
content: This is the worst headphones that I have ever bought. When I plug it into the computer, it automatically mute the sound. I have to press the volume control button twice to adjust the volume. I don't know if this is a malfunction or how it is designed. When I am watching a video or listening to music, the headphone will turn the volume down for no reason. It is super annoying. Do not buy this headphones.

author: ProcellaGray
title: Picks up everything
content: I love these headphones! I don't ever review products. But these are fire! I highly recommend them. They pick up all the details. I want to use these for streaming movies because it sounds like you're in a theatre. And my music is perfection on these bad boys. Bass!!!

author: Andrew Gehrke
title: Way comfy. Too much bass. NO trebel. Awful mic performance.
content:
EDIT: Too much bass for hearing voices. Multiple accounts of people not being able to hear my microphone. Better for music than gaming.

If you're only concerned about bass, these are well worth the money. I bought them for gaming, thinking the reviews expressed a general quality of sound. And sure, they sound good, but they are way too heavy on the bass for gaming.

Voice comms get distorted and even low music volumes disrupt the sound of ambient sounds.

I dont suspect I'll return these, as they work fine and only cost me $17, but I will likely order another pair of earbuds for gaming. I can take these with me on planes and crap.

Super comfy memory foam pieces, though.

author: Jamie
title: Great quality...for a while.
content: These earphones were great at first. The packaging was also great too. I had little to no problems, but then after a few days of using them, one of them had a dull sound and it wasn't loud as the other. It bothered me that one ear has a louder sound and in my other ear, it was just dull. Overall, they are okay.

author: JC
title: would purchase again
content: Pretty good headphones. Better sound and bass than from my skull candy headphones and I really liked the skull candy headphones. I like the build quality on these. They feel solid in your hands. They also fit well in my ears and don't really fall out unless tugged out. I hope they last because they fell nice, sound nice, and look really slick. I also like the magnetic little bag they came in and appear to be stored in.

author: Chris Wells
title: Ya gotta get the headphones! What are you waiting for?
content:
These headphones..........ARE THE BEST THING ON THIS F***ING EARTH I LOVE THEM SO F***ING MUCH!!!!!
No Shade, but the headphones are so much better then Beats. OMG! Who am I kidding? All tea. All shade.

author: Abhimanyu Sarin
title: Decent buy at 12$. For the 4 months that they worked
content:
Don't want to make this a rant because it's not even worth it but here goes- This is the last time I'll buy earbuds which are not from a well known company. My first impressions were that it looks mediocre at best with it's golden finish and not exactly an ear friendly design. Owned a Skullcandy Method before them and those were SURELY more bass heavy, but again, it's a decent compromise for the price. So if you prefer something understated and sleek, looks elsewhere please
Regardless, I would say no headphone is worth even a dollar if they don't last longer than a house mouse. The right ear has gone out, the mic seems to not function at all. Maybe it's me, maybe I rough housed it a bit by throwing them in my jeans back pocket and THAT'S where the difference lies- just buy a more expensive model so that you have to take care of it. These aren't cheap but rugged, just cheap.
Next stop, Bose SoundSport. They're 50$ but from a respectable company who do honor warranty

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great Headphones
content: Best headphones for the money I’ve ever bought.

author: John J
title: Sound Great
content: They sound fantastic. I’ve paid more for other headphones and they did not sound as good. I would buy it again.

author: GARY R.
title: You get what you pay for!
content: Why buy junk head phones like I did and have to buy another pair soon because they malfunction. I've had the Betron YS1000 for awhile now and they have been working great.Nice sound, volume control, very easy to operate.Very reasonable Finally a good pair of head phones. Thank you Betron.

author: Jay Campbell
title: Stop reading and buy this now!
content: Ordered it yesterday. It arrived 5 minutes ago. Hands down the BEST ear buds I have ever owned. UN-FREAKIN-BELIEVABLE!! They fit perfectly and comfortably. I thought I needed a new MP3 player but aparently all I needed was these amazing ear buds. Helpful tip, turn the volume down before you put these on.

author: Stella L
title: One thing that was a bit unclear.  These ear plugs have a 3.5 mm input.  To use these on any iPhones 7,8 or 9, you will need the
content: Completely surprised to find the quality of the headphones.  In fact, from the packaging to expedient  delivery, I can't be happier.  Hard to believe these headphones rival others at 7x the cost.

author: George wachsmuth
title: Well built and works well !
content: These headphones are a good replacement. A quality build...rugged plug and controls. Better than the original ear phones I originally got with my Ipad.

author: Anthony Fantano
title: Just got them today and they are not good
content: Too much treble, it's going to mess up someone's ears. Has a decent bass but can't enjoy much of it due to the treble getting in the way. I feel like most of the work was put on the packaging and look of the earphones that they forgot about the quality of the sound. You can put down the volume to help the treble from damaging your ears but then it sounds like you don't have the earphones all the way inside your ear. It's baffling seeing people unironically give these a good ratng.

author: Chris
title: GREAT sound.
content: The sound on these headphones is great, especially at the current price point. I recommended these to a friend who purchased them as well because of the great sound. The bass is really nice in them, something that I look for in earbuds. My ONLY complaint would be that they can run a little lose, sometimes not blocking out as much outside noise as you'd want---But it's such a MINOR complaint, that it doesn't matter!

author: bg3095
title: headphones
content: work great excellent sound

author: Jasmine Gerber
title: Fitting May Differ from Previous In-Ear Headphones
content: I found I had to use different sized silicone covers to accommodate my headphones, otherwise, these have been great so far! I've had mine for a week now and I wear them at work, they are very robust, cancel all background noises well, and the sound quality is equal or possibly even greater than the in-ear Beats by Dre I formerly owned.

author: Ben Phillips, Jr
title: The most important aspect is that Betron makes good quality earbuds. I made the right choice!
content: These are some really good earbuds. Love the design and the crisp, clear and quality sound it puts out. The bass doesn't drown out the artists and it feels like I am wearing ear phones. Job well done Betron.

author: NJ
title: Good sound, terrible design
content: I was skeptical just from looking at these beer can shaped cylinders that are supposed to fit in your ears.  I should have trusted my instincts instead of the reviews.  If you are going to sit perfectly still while wearing them you might just stand a chance of them staying in.  Otherwise, forget about it.  Get something else that is actually designed to sit in your ear.

author: Adrian
title: Not bass boosting!
content: This product was advertised at “bass boosting” and that is an absolute joke. It actually eliminated almost all bass in the music and made the voices way too loud... The sound quality if you don’t want bass boosting is AMAZING, but if you want bass.... this is the total opposite.

author: Yep Yep
title: Great product for the price
content: I needed something to replace my Samsung Note8 headphones. I found this product reading other product reviews and for the price, I wasn't disappointed. Great sound, buttons function as expected, and the product comes with a warranty so that's a plus as well

author: Mauro
title: Full, deep bass sound for a very reasonable price.
content: I have purchased this item based on the overall customer reviews, that was pretty high. I have tested the earbuds for about 3 days and I can confirm that the sound quality is superb. I get full deep bass sound, for a very reasonable price. Very happy with this purchase, I will be looking forward to test more products of this brand.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Does a really good job of blocking out mom’s voice.
content:
My son loves these sound canceling headphones. He said it’s very clear and the bass is much better than the ones he’s used in the past.
One month later.. sadly, the right earbud wire completely detached from the speaker/volume control.

author: Dids
title: Stay tuned for update. Loved at first.
content: I got these headphones a week ago. Someone else mentioned the size of the buds. Same prob I have, they're all too big. Now just today I plugged then in and there is some kind of static. A ticking. I'm afraid they're not as good as I initially thought.

author: Kat
title: Excellent quality for the price value
content: Excellent headphones for the price.  The earbuds themselves pop out of my ears when working out.  Sound quality is excellent.  Materials feel sturdy and durable.

author: Brenda Burke
title: Love these earbuds
content: Love these earbuds. When I dont want to have over the ear headphones on, I pop these babies in. They have been great on airplanes, around the house doing yardwork, cutting grass, etc. They arent powered, niose cancelling, but they do a nice job. Highly recommend.

author: Punishers Dog Max
title: Perfect product...
content: Great quality, sound, but a little bulky in your ear. Still 5 stars.

author: James
title: Glad I bought these
content: A year later and still work fine.

author: bp
title: I really liked these headphones
content: I really liked these headphones, exactly what I was looking for and a decent price. Less than two months in though, the left earbud started going in and out on me. I do use them pretty frequently but I take care of them and was hoping to get a longer life out of them.

author: LUVANGEL
title: Amazing.....👍
content: Omg these ear buds are amazing. Great sound, comfortable to wear, love the controls on the wire. The only thing that would make spectacular would be if the wire was just a few inches longer. But really these buds are worth every penny. 😀😀😀😀

author: tj
title: Great sound with pronounced bass!
content: I was very impressed with these headphones, especially considering the price. The packaging was high quality and having the little case with extra earbud covers is a nice bonus. The cord was the reason I chose these, because that has been a weak spot for other sets I have had. The cord seems very durable as described. But the sound was the biggest surprise - it is so rich and deep! I have had several sets of earbud headphones at higher cost which didn't sound nearly as good.  Very happy with this purchase!

author: Sweetiebell
title: They work wonderfully! There are some parts of it that I ...
content: This is the 2nd pair of these headphones that I've bought in the last 2 months. The first pair broke when I pulled my tablet out of the airline pocket while they were plugged into the port. Luckily they didn't completely break off inside of the tablet. They work wonderfully! There are some parts of it that I feel could be make better. For example, there are these little decorative "screens" that are glued on the outside of the earbud. Mine fell off the first time I used them. Now, it's simply decorative, but it would have been nice for the glue to have kept it there. I would consider buying them again.

author: Michael Wengler
title: I wish I got more apple earphones
content: They don’t fit well in the ear.

author: Tj
title: Too heavy foe your ears
content: The ear plugs were too heavy foe my ear and did not stay n place. However what may not work for me may work for someone else.

author: Ken D.
title: These are hurtful garbage. Seriously. They would be great for a steampunk Halloween costume.
content:
I had good expectations. The packaging was nice. The overall look quite retro/steampunk. Fit in ears wasn't great, although they get one extra star for including pretty high quality foam earbud pieces. You'd expect for the ear bud bits to be multiple sizes, but they look to be all one size. (And no, they don't stay in.)

These bud cans are quite heavy. Edges are sharp, and I wouldn't want to fall asleep with them. They are legit sharp enough to slash paper.

Now the sound; the only thing I cared about. Garbage.  My reference standard is a set of MDR-ZX110. A $20 set of headphones. This pair of Sony's is a ~ 3.5/5. My $200 pair of Bose earbuds from 8 years ago are a 4.5/5. A pair of RHA-150's from 6 years ago which has been in the washing machine and on a few hundred runs with me are a 4.0. And lastly, stock apple ear buds are a solid 3. These are a 1/5.

Sound is empty, full of extra tin, completely uncomfortable and no bass to speak of. They sound like they were cut from left over snare drum heads after a high school band drum line battle.

author: Jackson
title: Volume decrease with static
content: They're alright for sound, not too much bass, but not too good. The odd issue is when I'm wearing clothing that generates some static electricity, when I move around the volume sometimes gets decreased which is irritating. Never had this happen with any other headphones, so I'm not sure if it's something with the metal or what. That's the big part.

author: Anna
title: The sound is pretty good
content: Nice clean, crisp sound even at higher volumes. Good bass. Having slight difficulties finding the right size earbud to get good seal in the ear. I am testing them out.

author: Greg Alexander
title: Look for a better value elsewhere
content: These earbuds are fairly decent for the price - the sound is acceptable and the fit is as good as any other brands out there.  My biggest problem is with the amount and severity of noise these things produce.  I've used them in both an iPhone and an iPad always with the same result.  The static noise and crackling evident when in use is almost a deal breaker on ever owning another set.

author: Julia ☆
title: Great sound quality but....
content: The sound quality is great, as a drummer I love the sound! But my one and only complaint is that these ear buds will not stay in my ears when I run or exercise. If you are someone who enjoys listening to music when you run, and you are looking for earbuds for that purpose, these may not be what you are looking for. But if you just want to listen to music while not running, this is perfect!

author: Bud
title: Reasonable earbuds
content: Excellent earbuds bass is deep I bought a pair for my wife and she loves these earbuds so do I .

author: Mallory
title: Love these!! Highly recommend
content: Absolutely love these ear buds! Great at cancelling out noise, the sound quality is excellent and overall they seem sturdy enough when I take them to the gym with me.

author: Karen Kozlowski
title: Sound good; uncomfortable to wear
content: I don’t wear earbuds for long periods of time - on the treadmill or in an airplane. Although the sound quality was good, I found these buds very uncomfortable to wear. It felt like there was a metal piece digging into my ear through the cushion. These will be used for the gym but I will look for something more comfortable to wear for more than an hour.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Dont Work
content: one of the earphones doesn't work. the adjuster for the volume doesn't work and will mute and turn up the volume all the way when I'm not touching it. and the ear phones fall out of my ears.

author: Dave
title: Excellent ear plugs
content: The quality is way superior to other ear pieces that I have used, and folks are saying that they hear my voice really clearly when chatting on the phone. Also, the wire is tangle free and the carry case is a great accessory.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Loud
content: I get more volume and deeper bass than my old headphones. They come with a set of ear pieces of diff sizes and a nice case to carry them in. They feel beefy. Made of metal, not plastic. They work well on phone calls also, I mostly listen to music or games.

author: TechlovingMoses
title: Excellent quality for the price!
content: These earphones are definitely worth more than the cost. The sound quality and build quality is top notch. Must say I couldn't ask for anything better at this price. Amazing product!!

author: Jill Perrin
title: Heavy, kept falling out. Good sound.
content: Noise isolation, not noise canceling. Sounded good. Heavy earbuds kept falling out regardless of the tips I used. I returned these and bought the Betron BS-10. The BS-10 is half the price, stays in my ears, and offers the same Betron quality.

author: Julie Chung
title: Left earbud stopped working after 1.5 months
content: I had the previous model (without the remote control) for a couple years and loved them until they stopped working (one side stopped and I noticed the cord was a little longer than the other, so it must have been disconnected). So I bought this newer model. However, the left side with the control buttons stopped working (became muffled in sound) after 1.5 months! Luckily Amazon was great and issued a one-time exception for a refund even though a month had passed. Such a shame since I love the look and feel of these earphones.

author: Matt Janeway
title: Nice earbuds
content:
As a person who is very picky about their earbuds I have a tough time finding what I want for the price I want to pay. There are time when spending top dollar doesn’t always lead to top quality either. With that said these earbuds offer a decent quality sound for a decent price. Also love how it functions with my iPhone. There are others out there who claim they’ll work with iOS but don’t.

Only flaw I see in these earbuds is some more options for the earpieces like the cone shaped ones maybe. Apart from that they are great. Although the memory foam tips are more comfortable.

author: Ellen Cervantes
title: Awesome experience all around
content: Quick delivery, great quality sound, made to last, and really cool looking! I highly recommend these headphones.

author: elizabeth johnson
title: Great Sound
content: Great sound! love the case. lots of variety on earbuds to fit every size ear

author: Lamont
title: Great buy
content: Very satisfied to the point I both another for my daughter..Definitely a high quality earphone!!!

author: Bec
title: Real metal goldtone, hushes the world
content: I liked the metal on these earbuds.  The components seem sturdy.  I'm not crazy about the see through cable.  There are foam earpieces included.  It really cuts down on sound.  The case is really nice and comes with a small carry pouch and a lapel clip for the mic. Ive seen much worse for the price.  Would make a pretty gift.  I concur with other shoppers.  A woven wire cover would add to the durability and beauty of the product.

author: allen rather
title: An incredible value
content: I've had these ear buds for about a month, using them about every other day.  I use them mostly for viewing movies or playing video games at night but have put these headphones through its paces with music as well.  I am very pleased with the sound.  Very good on the low end, with the mid range and highs quite solid too.  The noise cancelling is shockingly good, almost too good.  They block out a lot of noise so be mindful if using them while driving or riding.  Finally, I really liked the build quality.  Feels solid.  I am definitely getting another pair to give as a gift.

author: Jess
title: Best Headphones I've Ever Had
content: I bought these as a replacement for the factory made headphones that came with my Samsung galaxy s8. These are and amazing replacement for anyone looking for quality headphones.

author: Ethan Seftor
title: Good but not for the long term
content: One side blew out after less than two months of owning the pair. Good headphones and noise cancelling but not worth what they cost compared to cheaper longer lasting earbuds. They also had an issue where whenever they rubbed up against a static fabric the volume level would just drop so don’t buy these if you wear sweatpants or hoodies often

author: Andreamsand
title: Awesome quality!
content: Best headphones for the money, high quality sound, fits my ears perfectly. I love the controls too. It also came a day early and packed very nicely. I am really impressed. I would definitely order again!!

author: muchobytes
title: Not bad, nice looking but bass is disappointing.
content: Sound is pretty impressive but bass response was not what I was expecting.  The product description didn't include a lot of headphone performance specs so I looked it up on a different site which suggested far better db numbers and given what information there was about the drivers, I thought for sure the bass would be much better.  Can't really complain at this price but all in all not that much better than the free headphones I recently got with an ASUS Zenfone.

author: harold hansen
title: Very sturdy!
content: Just got my 2nd set of earbuds from Betron. First pair lasted about 6 months which is about 3 times longer than from other brands. Been using plug in earphones for years and this product is hands down the best I've ever had. Most other earphones I've had used cheap wiring while Betron's wiring was I'd say at least twice as thick. Also included a cover for the prong that goes into the device to deter corrosion (never saw that before). And the sound is better than any of the earphones I have used to walk the beach for years (  I am 70). Been fighting which these low grade headphones for years which last 2-3 months at most and am finally glad to have come across Betron!!!

author: Darin Kelly
title: Meh, they're basic earbuds, nothing spectacular.
content: They work.  Sounds okay, but they do have a somewhat "tinny" sound.  Just not high quality like the ad suggests.  I like that you can adjust the volume on the cord.  They DO NOT have any better bass response than any other cheap earbuds have.  Wouldn't buy again.  I'll use them when I mow and when they quit working I'll buy another brand.

author: SDeep
title: Weird and Shocking !!!
content:
I was extremely hesitant to give it one-star, after seeing so many good feed-backs (not to mention this is my first such feed-back in last 10 years) - so I did search the one-stars first, and voila!! Certain "amazon customer" with verified purchase gave a feedback on January 22nd, and - well, I am cut-pasting from his review comments, exactly the same.
==========
<<The worst headphones I've ever purchased. I had them for maybe 3 days and used them while on the treadmill. They worked fine while walking, but the minute I would start running the volume would continually go down without me pressing the button on the headphone or on my actual phone.>>
==========
In my case it was iPad - that's the only difference. Now let us see what else he wrote -
==========
<<I felt a sharp jolt around where the metal touched my ear. At first I thought I might have just imagined it but then it happened again. I switched the earbuds around and noticed the same thing in my other ear.>>
==========
Again, in my case I was so startled that I threw it... that's the only difference.

Amazon's Choice???? If Amazon is choosing like this, may be it has become finally too big for it's own good.

author: Richard Darrell
title: Excellent quality
content: I really like the earbud headphones. The sound quality is excellent and I like the handy carry case that came with it.

author: J. K. Stephenson
title: A 5 star rating for the gold plated finish, the price, weight and sound quality.
content: The Betron YSM1000 Headphones Earbuds High Definition in-ear Noise Isolating Heavy Deep Bass provides a fairly clean balanced sound. Although the bass sounds good, I was expecting a deeper bass. However, the sound does not distort noticeably when the volume is turned up.

author: hildred mcdade
title: Buy these
content: They give you a nice case to hold them in and also give you a total of three rubber ear plugs for the ear buds and also noise reduction ones that are black and make of foam rubber like ear plus are made of. Amazing noise reduction. Hope they last.

author: CMM
title: Nice headphones, but broke within 6 months.
content:
The reviews didn't lie about these headphones. They sound great, they seem to be made with high quality materials. I believe the cord itself is the weak point, as it isn't braided or anything. After 4 months the right earbud stopped working. Not sure if I got a lemon or if they just aren't made to last, but 4 months is not long enough.

Everything about the headset screams quality from packaging to features, but that doesn't do much when they stop working.

author: Howard Moore
title: Sound like crap
content: I don't know who wrote all those reviews. But this is mine, they sound muffled and high pitched. But you can buy them if you want. There cheap enought. But I would try another set. I didn't send them back, I just took the lick. Like I said they were cheap and not worth the time to box them and send back or I would have.

author: Sabrina Dearing
title: Really great product overall.
content: I really loved the memory foam covers but, sadly, they do not last. Lots of extra silicone covers, nice packaging.

author: G Williams
title: Didn’t Last Very Long
content:
Had them for less than two months and the sound in one of the earbuds went out in both sets at different times

Don’t seem to be made very well.  Yes, they’ll have really awesome sound when you first use them but apparently aren’t build to last which sucked

author: Ryan Bach
title: good sound and build quality, looks nice
content: Looks and sounds much better than the price would suggest. Highly recommended if you're looking for decent-but-not-high-end earbuds and like the style of these.

author: The Professional Purchaser
title: A++
content: I purchased these for someone and it works great. Excellent packaging as well.

author: Jenny
title: Volume control issues
content:
These headphones look nice and have decent sound quality. However, I think I received a defective pair because my volume controls would automatically adjust themselves without me ever touching them. This has happened several times when using with my laptop where it would just turn the volume all the way up by itself. I reached out to the seller who said they would send me a replacement and instructions to return the defective pair. It is now nearly a week later, and I have not received either.

UPDATE: Received the replacement headphones but there was still no communication with the seller. Bumped the review up to 4 stars.

author: EMR8505
title: Nope
content: I purchased these headphones, thinking they would be fine for occasional use. Within about 10 uses, they change the volume on me without me touching the button, simply by moving my head. Also, they have started shocking my ear while turning the volume down. Kind of defeats the purpose...

author: Amazon Customer
title: (Not for a run or athletic workouts in my opinion, just relaxing or walking)
content: For the price and quality I like. The ends of the pods fell off that were meant for design but it matches and doesn’t look like anything happened. Haha. Regardless, if that happened or not I’d recommend them. Comfort and sounds are great!

author: Marianne
title: Thicc bass. Too much for me.
content:
So far I am mildly satisfied with this product. The presentation of the packaging is impressive and the head phones themselves look good.

The sound definitely has a v shaped sound profile. The lows can be overpowering and make the mix muddy. Even with songs that you want bumpin can sound like you are just listening to a kick drum. But with a little EQ fu they sound pretty clear. The drivers are definitely capable.

I would say this product was a teeny bit disappointing. I was expecting a much clearer listening experience with some strong bass. But it was just all lows and bass. I'd say check them out if you love that big bass. Compared to beats I can say they are much stronger.. so I guess they've got that going for them? But compared to other low mid tier headphones they are disappointing to how cool they look.

author: LLM
title: Cheap knockoffs!
content: I ordered these because the first two were a very high quality ear buds that sounded great. So I ordered a third set and was so disappointed when they arrived snd were a cheap knockoff from China. Quality was terrible, sound very poor. The cords are really cheap. Piece of junk.

author: Civil Servant
title: Nice looking, I get compliments
content: Nice set of phones for the price The phone mic works well and they're good for multi-purpose use (tunes/phone). Folks have reviewed them as blingy, but I don't see it.  They're responsive, especially the mid to high range but not nearly as loud as the 12mm Betron AelecS350Us models that blast bass but are short on the mid and highs. If your phone or MP3 player has an equalizer, you could compensate the lower bass output because these mid's and highs are really good for the price.

author: Min Pin
title: Still the best
content: I've bought $100 headphones that still don't sound as good as these do. This is the second pair I've purchased in the last several years.

author: Stan Pendergrass
title: Loud and plenty of bass
content: Got my Betron YSM1000 headphones last Friday. Was excited to use them for the 1st time! Decided to listen to In a Gadda Da Vita. At first not what I thought they were going to be,  but after getting them fitted to my ears correctly man what a difference! This buds have plenty of everything you might want in a headphones. Gotta say glad I made this purchase, would suggest them to anyone looking for quality at a economic price.

author: James Heyden Renn
title: The best headphones on the market
content: These headphones are great, better the beats by far. The cord could be better and the red and green paint on the headphones shouldn't be there.

author: MJ
title: Incredible for the price
content: They come with a cute little holder pouch which was a nice surprise because I throw them in my backpack to commute in NYC. It's been a few weeks using them and I've had no issues.

author: chicken little
title: Good, but issues
content: The sound quality is excellent. However, I have had several issues with these earbuds. None of the earbuds provided are actually small enough to fit very comfortably. There is also so heft to these compared to other ear buds I’ve used. The tight fit of even the smallest pair creates a feeling of my ears needing to pop. If I am still I can rest them in my ear without the tight fit. If I need to stand, walk, or move they constantly fall out of my ears. If I sit perfectly still they are great ear buds but I still have to grab my old earphones any time I want music on the go.

author: Jeffery A Ford
title: Sounded OK, didn't last.
content: I bought a pair for each of my boys, didn't work past 2 weeks. I didn't return in the short window to amazon so I tried to use the 1 year warranty from manufacturer. You can get to their website but none of the warranty links work. [ Not in the U.S.] Can't use the extended warranty I purchased until the year runs out. FAIL !! Make your own call.

author: lbrett90
title: Good sound but only lasted a few months
content: These were fine earbuds and good for the price, but they only made it about three months before the sound started cutting out. Sometimes they work, sometimes only one side or the other works, or sometimes they both work but the loudest sound is still very faint. Not a reliable or durable design.

author: *DAO*
title: Electric Shocks In Ears
content: Kept giving me random electric shocks in my ears. Very unpleasant feeling.

author: Victor F
title: JUNK JUNK JUNK
content: Junk just plain junk I could've got better ones at a gas station for $5 don't trust the reviews an purchase at your own risk

author: Marie Fortune
title: Love this product
content: Great product great sound quality and packaged beautiful. Love this product

author: K. Paris
title: Not strong bass
content: I had read a review online and was hoping for earbuds which had a stone bass. These do not have a strong bass. The treble is very strong, though. They are not particularly comfortable. I really was hoping for better performance. The noise cancellation is really not there either. I have a pair from another manufacture which has better noise cancellation.

author: Christian Nielsen
title: Didn't last long
content: I started out loving these headphones but after a little over 2 months of use the speaker in one ear just stopped working :( I'm extremely disappointing

author: Amazon Customer
title: Sound quality is better than my original iphone ear bud
content:
Ear bud has metal case and it feels solid.  It could be a little cold to use outside during winter time, though.
Sound quality is better than my original iphone ear bud, I think.  Quality of phone call is very good as well.

author: Kaileigh
title: Probably best pair because they've yet to break after a month. Good sound quality.
content: We'll see how I feel after they break how I feel. So far, they've been holding up for a good month.

author: Alice
title: Good stuff!
content: They’re really nice. Not too much in the way of bass but i’m using them as an alternative to my over ear headphones so not really a fair comparison. The memory foam earbuds really really won me over too where have these been all my life!

author: scopes
title: Good sound quality and noise blocking at a good price.
