Like my right earphone will loose volume and my left one will stay the same.  It happen every once and a while at first.  Now it happens every other day. The little piece that covers the whole the music comes out of came off on both headphones. I don't know about a lifetime warranty but you definitely get what you pay for. Don't get it.

author: Elizabeth Douglass
title: Sounded good but ! like even the 1 $ear  buds they just don’t last .
content: Stopped working after a month or two Sounded good but ! like even the 1 $ear  buds they just don’t last long at all. I had a one pair of headphones last me 15 years before but I purchased those in the 90s

author: Reid Woolery
title: I love 'em!
content: I bought these for a long bus trip and was very pleased with their performance. I don't get into heavy bass so I can't really speak to that feature, but the overall quality is wonderful! Best earbuds I've ever owned. I listen to a lot of jazz and alternative music, and the quality of the sound was top notch in my book. For such a low price these earbuds give you real quality.

author: Barbara Bruce
title: decent, but has issues
content: I bought these because I use headphones off and on for 12 hours per day and this usage kills batteries on Bluetooth headphones. The sound is decent, but they do not stay in, especially if I chew gum. So I bought replacement tips with multiple ridges and after market stabilizer wings. They work well and stay securely in my ears. Now, I've started feeling little shocks on my ears from these headphones. Unfortunately, this is something I can't live with and will be replacing them.

author: MK
title: Great earbud replacement!
content: I bought these to replace the Samsung earbuds and they are MUCH MUCH better.  Sound is really good and as I take the bus to work it does cancel some of the noise. I am very pleased and will buy again.

author: NCguy
title: Abysmal Sound Quality
content:
Nicely Packaged, and seemingly very Well-Made Earphones.  Sadly, the Positives end there.

The Sound Quality of the YSM-1000s is a Sick Joke.  Akin to having Mud, with Shards of Broken Glass injected into the Ear Canals under pressure.

The entire Musical Spectrum is mis-represented with the most confused, and disorganized Tonal Character.  Old, Familiar, and Wonderfully Mastered Recordings are rendered almost unrecognizable.

For me to state that the Sound is Unsatisfactory would be a gross understatement.  I'm very disappointed with this purchase.

author: Amazon Customer
title: The worst headphones I've ever purchased
content: The worst headphones I've ever purchased. I had them for maybe 3 days and used them while on the treadmill. They worked fine while walking, but the minute I would start running the volume would continually go down without me pressing the button on the headphone or on my actual phone. Additionally, I was using them to listen to an online lecture for class and am pretty sure they shocked the inside of my ear. I felt a sharp jolt around where the metal touched my ear. At first I thought I might have just imagined it but then it happened again. I switched the earbuds around and noticed the same thing in my other ear. Do not buy these headphones unless you plan on using them while staying completely motionless and don't mind getting electrocuted every few minutes

author: Jomar
title: Great Product but I there is an issue that might shock you...
content: The sound quality and bass on these are phenomenal. The only issue I have with these are that while I’m working the volume dongle is sensitive to static. Anytime I run a plastic bag over or near the dongle. The volume gets turned down and I’ve visibly scene it happen on my screen. Sometimes while I’m listening they hurt my ears I can feel a subtle electrical charge. That can spike and be pretty painful. Otherwise I still use these on a daily basis

author: Annie
title: Great product, price, and fast delivery
content: I bought these earbuds for my daughter. Delivery was fast. Actually recieved a day before expected. She absolutely loves them. Says the sound is perfect and obviously nose cancellation works because she can't hear me when I talk to her. Lol

author: I like Uke
title: Great for the price
content: So far so good.  Good sound and design for the price.  Build quality seems solid.

author: kingkingg
title: Expected bass to be better but its up there.
content: Bass is something I look for in earphones and these were pretty good, it still bumps pretty good if tuned with an equalizer. My previous earphones have had a harder kick to them in the ear and it doesn't really do justice but just the sound of bass can be heard for the majority instead of being felt. Also, rattles can be heard sometimes when moving the ear buds around but goes away in a bit. Pretty great product overall.

author: Kindle Customer
title: Great product.
content: Great product. Work well for noise reduction.  This is my second pair. My others were ruined by leaving them hanging on floor. My robot vacuum cleaner ran over them. Would buy again.

author: Parsons Tuesday
title: These headphones had great sound quality
content: They have a design issue that limits their long term survivability, where on the inside of their housings the rubber grommets holding the wires in tear over time. They also have weird reactions to wind. All in all these are great headphones, just wish they lasted longer.

author: Mark K.
title: Didn't like these much - may be a wrong purchase on my part
content: I didn't like these earbuds. The cans are VERY large and painful to use laying down on my side. They don't stay in my ears if I'm walking around the house much less a walk outside. It was my sense that there was a lot of hiss at times using them but for some unknown reason I didn't notice the iPhone designations and my phone is Android so possibly that's the issue there. Anyway, quite disappointed overall but didn't think it fair to return.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Small Ears Beware
content: These headphones seemed really nice but unfortunately they don't fit my ears at all, even when using the smallest size of earbuds. They claim they were noise-isolating but because they don't fit properly into my ear, that never actually happens, which is unfortunate since I have a loud and noisy bus commute I was hoping to use these for. I really wanted to like these but after two weeks of use, they only really cause me dread. So I guess, people with small ears, beware. I'm sure everyone else would love these headphones.

author: SnowPigs
title: Not horrible, but not as bass heavy or loud as expected based on description.
content: I expected thumping bass and crisp clear loud volume.  I did not get that.  These earbuds are perfectly fine, just not as described.

author: mamabear78
title: I like these headphones a lot
content: I like these headphones a lot, but I will say they are not ideal for running/exercise as they do tend to fall out.  When using them at home though, the sound is great and I have enjoyed using them.

author: David A Carlson
title: Our family brand is Betron
content: Sound quality and craftsmanship are outstanding. Four of us in the family. Two of us have Betron ear buds, and a third likes them so much he is about to order his own.

author: Jeonno
title: Maybe keep looking.
content: If you're looking for an affordable good looking pair of headphones, maybe keep searching. Mine lasted two weeks before the in line mic side developed a short. I'm pretty anal about electronics, so it wasn't lack of care. Audio was good while it lasted though.

author: nicole
title: Worth the price.
content: Sound quality is amazing.

author: Dee
title: My new favorite brand!
content: I'm impressed with these earphones they're actually a lot better than my skullcandy earphones and I only buy skullcandy earphones (which recently broke). So I decided to buy some replacement earphones until I get another headset but I'm actually liking these so much I'm not going to buy anymore until these wear out. I like the quality of these for the price I paid which is a lot of bang for your buck, also these are actually $40.00 earphones because I was curious who the company was that made them seeing I've never heard of Betron.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Button Fell Out Almost Immediately
content: I purchased these about three weeks ago and only opened them about 2 weeks ago. In this short time, one of the volume control buttons has fallen out. I keep these headphones at my desk at work, so they are treated delicately and experience little wear. For the button to just fall right off is pretty bizarre and indicative of poor manufacturing. Furthermore, the sound has a static noise (not a subtle noise either, it's quite loud), no matter what device I use. I tried using several other headphones, and none of them have the same issue.

author: Renato
title: Performs like a champion.
content: I have purchased 5 of these earphones. They deliver excellent sound and they are durable. The more I use a pair of this earphones the better sounding it gets. Every member of my family wants a pair of this earphones based on the excellent performance. I am only saying all of these because they are true.

author: Mike Alvarez
title: Bumpin Headphones!
content: These are my favorite wired in ear headphones thus far! I’m an iPhone user & they’re so good that I got an adapter just to use these. I’ll be letting people know that Betron is the way to go for in ear headphones from now on! Sound cancellation is good but not so strong that you’re completely unaware of your surroundings. Perfect to have if you take the bus. Podcast sound so crisp w/ these Betrons. Go cop a pair!

author: g
title: 6 Months in...
content: I've had these earbuds for about 6 months. They look great and sound good, but over time I've been receiving a lot of electrical shocks from them when plugged into a computer or when I plug my phone in to the wall. Also, the bendable metal springs have started to cut through the fabric on the carrying case it comes with.

author: Colleen
title: Cat Proof(?)
content: My cat had attempted to eat my earbuds and survived the attempt.

author: Bertie
title: Too big
content: The headphones are nice but they are too large for my ears. I changed the cushions and they still fall out

author: Bryan Hernandez
title: Everything was good at first...
content: I bought these headphones a month ago and at first I was quite pleased with the overall product, presentation & performance but just now the left earbud went out and I am not too sure quite what to think and I've lightly used them. Because of this I rated the product overall 3 stars, everything else was perfect as far as bass levels, sound clarity and noice cancellation. Hopefully you guys will honor the warranty any more info on that would be much obliged!

author: francisco munoz
title: Lit
content: I think they're okay for the money but I think you can find better quality sounding ear phones but I don't have the time or money to look for any. I like wood ones that are advertised all the time. But they're like 25 so if you want to blow money go for those

author: EHUD BARAN
title: Great value and great sound!
content:
Great earphones; I love the look, the material, the sound and the fact that all functions work great with my OnePlus 6t.

Best value for the price!

author: dmitry zherebilov
title: Great sound, bass, over all a bit bulky
content:
These headphones have great quality sound
Only wanted to point out that they stick out of the ear more because they are longer and a tiny bit heavier than other styles, they also have the solid built mic/ctrl  and mid connection piece  which  also give the chords that much more pull downwards. The jack , is also Longer but  solid built and makes an easy grab. however it also makes  it easier  to hit on somthing. while sitting you resting the phone/ your wrists  slightly on yourself this  will also bend the chord  because of the length of the jack.

author: Mac Sogandares
title: Four Stars
content: Sound quality is okay, but I have zero complaints. The controller works on an android too.

author: yekaterina balagian
title: Five Stars
content: Really good quality headphones. Excellent packaging and carrying case.

author: Jimena Arreola
title: Not meant for working out
content: These headphones are very nice in appearance and can effectively block out noise. However, they fall out of my ears when i work out. If you want these for the gym, look elsewhere. The sound quality is well but I've had these for 4 months now and have noticed that sometimes the volume they emit fluctuates.

author: Helen M.
title: Nice quality
content: Very nice quality. Hope they are stronger/ longer lasting cord

author: Jesse Frazier
title: It is very low budget
content:
They are very good looking and fit well, however, the sound was not what I expected.  I expected MUCH deeper bass and crisper highs. Maybe mine were defective?? Not sure...Maybe my hearing range is different....??

Unfortunately, I returned them the next day after receipt.  I think the product is good, but could be significantly better.

Thanks!!!

author: jleedmd
title: Received with broken pieces
content: The metal piece on the back of the earbud came already off and bent in half.  Looks like it is glued on the back.  Purely esthetic it appears so an unnecessary piece that I think will always eventually fall off.  I would just remove it in its design.  I returned it without purchasing another one.  Didn't want something breaking 2-3 months later.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great sound quality
content: Great ear buds for riding

author: AmraLeo
title: Nice...
content: I can finally write a review on these...they were a Christmas present for my daughter. First, they came prime fast, no problems. In the time before Christmas came, I received TWO emails from them asking how I liked them. Pretty impressive. Material quality: when she opened them, she didn't want to touch them, they looked "too fancy". Sound quality: She plugged them into her phone, and her eyes lit up. I haven't been able to listen to them myself, but by her reaction they must sound mighty fine. I had been buying her some Panasonic earphones, which don't sound bad for the price, BUT, these are about the same price. They LOOK tons better, and (apparently) sound better. Can't say anything about how they stand up, as she just opened them a few hours ago. All in all, I'm impressed. So far...

author: Amazon Customer
title: Samsung should use these instead of AKG
content: These things are awesome for the price. Quality is reassuring and sound is very good for these being this cheap. They even come with a nifty little bag that feels great. Usually you get horrible sound with earbuds at this cost. Samsung should have gave us these in the Phone box instead of those AKG. (Galaxy s9).  Not sure how they're durability is though, need time for that. I do take well care of my stuff though so it shouldn't be a problem.

author: Heather Lynne Weber
title: Pretty Damn Durable
content: I've had these a while now, maybe 4 months or so, and they're still going strong. I work in an office and use them 8 hours a day, 5 days a week (and I'm a little rough on them, they sit in my truck while not in use... in Texas, it gets hot enough to bake cookies in there). The little mesh piece on the back of one bud fell off, but otherwise still perfectly functional. Pleased for the price and they sound great! Would recommend

author: Choubie
title: My second set of ears.
content:
From the time I received the Beton Headphones, Earbuds I just can't stop listening to my classical music. The sound quality is so vivid, you would think that you are actually close to the orchestra band.
Thank you so much for this product and the price was very reasonable.

author: Frequent Buyer
title: A Pleasant Surprise
content: Very pleased with this purchase. For the price, I expected to receive basic earphones. The stereo sound quality surprised me. The buds sit comfortably and tightly in my ears, even when moving around. Even the packaging was pleasing. Although that has nothing to do with the product, it suggests that the company cares about the product.

author: Wubba Lubba Dub Dub
title: Good, Solid Pair of Headphones. Arrived nice and neat in an orderly fashion. Would Buy Again
content:
Seriously, these are very good headphones.

I wanted something that was above average with audio quality, but could stand the test that I usually put headphones through.

The only negative aspect to them is that the wire is a weird, very grippy rubber, so it can get caught on itself and on other things. This can be a positive and negative thing.

author: Julie
title: Good Base
content: they are awesome.. till my son left them in his jeans and I washed them.  :(

author: JerseyJeff
title: Comfortable Fit
content: I bought these when the buds that came with my Samsung S7 failed.  They are a reasonable price, seem really well made, and produce good sound.  I'll have to see on durability, since I've only had them less than a month, but as they appear well made, I have hope in this regard!

author: Dave Braune
title: These are awful. After 2 months the mic buttons ...
content: These are awful.  After 2 months the mic buttons don’t work, I can’t speak on the phone with anyone because background noise is too loud, and they simply are uncomfortable to wear. Absolutely awful.

author: Lloyd S. Gray
title: Good buy
content: These are great little head phones that tuck into a pocket of my bag.  I bring them everywhere with my my MacBook.

author: Adalberto Lopez
title: It's okay for the price
content: Ehhh pretty good but not for my ears it fits weird sounds really good tho makes sure you have and iPhone or a good Android for best quality sound

author: Jimmy Duggan
title: WOW !!!
content: If you want REAL QUALITY from a company; BETRON is the one for you. Apart from my headphones being AMAZING the whole package was AWESOME beyond belief for the money. I am a BETRON customer for LIFE !!!!

author: raheem williams
title: The back of one of the earplugs canes loose in less than 3 days...
content: The back of one of the earplugs canes loose in less than 3 days... it would get stuck in my hoodies and the ruff edges would prick my finger whenever I try to push it in my ear, eventually I had to remove which took away from the whole look of it

author: Ewatson
title: Great for the price
content: We have some pretty expensive earbuds that we didn’t want to take on a trip so we bought these. I figured I would use them for the trip and that would be that. I find myself using more than my other pair now. Their sound good, they are comfortable. I didn’t expect this quality for the price. I’ve been recommending them to all of my friends.

author: Andrea Espinoza
title: Disappointed
content: I ordered the same set of earphones before this pair and i absolutely loved them sound quality and all are fit n feel of them. My son wanted a pair because he was so impressed so i got him the same ones just different color but what he received was a pair that were same color but bad sound quality with no bass. I don’t understand why we received two completely different quality earphones. Really sucks but ill just have order him another pair from another seller. I bought the panasonic ones for my daughter and those sound great so ill just buy him those instead.

author: Fireslash
title: Great sound and bang for your buck!
content:
For how little they cost they are amazing in every way, sound is really good, comfortable to wear, nice carrying case and different tip size for better fit.
I have bought several earbuds of more recognized brands like Panasonic, Sony, Philips and they are not anywhere close to this ones and for about the same or higher price.

Highly recommended if you don't want to spend a lot of money and still get a great product, will buy again if needed.

author: SAM Tamriar
title: Great Headphones, in line mic works on Android, buy separate noise isolation tips
content:
Awesome headphones for the price, pair this up with New Bees noise isolation earbud tips ($6) and you got some of the best in ear headphones for around $18-20. Truly great quality headphones with awesome sound quality rivaling all of my former earbuds (Beats, Skullcandy, Sony, etc.) Only fault is that it feels fragile but with the one year free warranty, there's really no worries. Would recommend to anyone. Also, do not chew on the chord.

P.S. The in line mic controls allowed me to raise and lower the volume for my Android Motorola, not just for iOS devices.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Damaged extremely quickly.
content: These headphones had great sound quality, but only lasted for a couple of months before failing. They have a design issue that limits their long term survivability, where on the inside of their housings the rubber grommets holding the wires in tear over time. They also have weird reactions to wind. All in all these are great headphones, just wish they lasted longer.

author: faiszu
title: Excellent Product
content: Before buying Betron YSM 1000 headphones I tried two different brands but both of them looked very good in the pictures but actually were very substandard so I returned them.  After a little bit of browsing I found Betron headphones.  Excellent sound quality and very well built.  After checking for one week I ordered two more.  I am one happy customer.  I would definitely recommend them to anyone.

author: Rico r
title: High quality sound love it
content: In all honesty ,the ear piece as a whole is pretty big,I know theres alot of sound quality in each head phone..so no negative remarks here

author: Darline Davila
title: The sound is great
content: This headphones sound like none other I previously had. The bass line sounds good and steady, the treble is not anoying and has a great balance. The only point down is for the external material that touches my ear, after a while hurts because the metal part scratches the cartilage of my ear.

author: Tiffany
title: Faulty
content: The reviews for the item are mostly positive, but I guess I'm just like the unluckiest man alive because within 2 months the sound started to get muted and there is nearly no sound in like like earphone.

author: Christopher A Lundgren
title: Great quality, great sound, new higher price
content: Excellent quality headphones for the price, however as of writing this review, I've learned the price is $7 dollars higher than it was 1 month ago (purchased in December 2018). I was worried the metal body of the earbuds would be heavy or uncomfortable, but they are comfortable and offer great performance. The wire is generally very resistant to tangling and the metal 3.5 mm jack seems very sturdy. The sound is balanced aside from the accentuated bass. At $12.99 they were a steal, but at their current price there are other options (higher and lower in price) that I would consider first.

author: Vanta
title: Very durable and good.sound
content: Love the durability of the headphones. Great sound.

author: Anthony G. Gerulat
title: Best bang for your buck!
content: These are the best earphones for the cost. The bass is phenomenal and the sound is perfect. Under 15 dollars you cannot ask for a better product. I have no idea how these guys can make an amazing product and manage to pay for nice packaging and sell it for so cheap while making a prohet.

author: Noel J. Spicuzza III
title: Very nice for the price
content: I enjoy these headphones. Nice sound quality, bass could be a bit better (personal choice). Clear highs and they stay in the ear pretty well. Only reasons for the 4 star rating is the bass and it feels as though the cords could pop at any time. They seem unusually thin (coating). We’ll see how they hold up!

author: Yogi
title: Insane Quality for the Price!
content:
Great frequency response and Bass is very clear.  These are wayyyyyy Better than beats and have a good build and sound quality!

P.S. I am a student in High School and these Noise isolating earbud help quite a bit.  You can increase the volume a lot before it actually starts to leak out of the earbud itself.

author: Kathryn Joan
title: Fall right out of your ears
content: The outer part of these are heavy, so they don't stay in your ears very well. They're okay to use while sitting, but don't stay in while walking or exercising. Decent sound quality if you're not picky.

author: MaybeNever
title: Exactly what I needed
content:
I was looking for some new earphones and thankfully I found these. Sound is good and controls work well. No complaints-

threw them and they landed in my cup of water (ew) - i fished them out right away. AND IT STILL WORKS

author: Patrick P Stevenson
title: Sounds good
content: Nothing short of awesome!!! Sounds better than my $250 pair of another brand. I highly recommend

author: Nelson
title: Okay sound. Very flat.
content:
I was surprisingly very disappointed with these headphones.

Design and feel of the headphones were great out of the box. Amazing look and construction.

The sound however... it sounded almost like you were listening to a speaker on the other side of the room. The lows were audible but the highs were very flat. The overall sound was not good for human voice. Which means video/podcasts were no good.

Don’t get me wrong. The ear buds sounded very decent, especially when I was comparing them directly to the cheap Sony $9 earbuds. You might not even notice the “distant” sound when listening to a lot of songs. But if you want to use this for more than that — it’s going to sound off.

(I wanted to use this for professional work on the go as a video editor but I could not do it.)

author: cielocellista
title: Ouch! Not a good shock...
content:
Item continually shocks me, literally. I bought these to use at the office so I could hear my podcasts and listen to music with more subtle nuances (as a musician, I frequently listen to music with a wide dynamic range).
After being shocked multiple times, I contacted the sellers and their response was to tell me that it is not possible for them to shock me, as the piece fitted in the ear is not metal. They say it is likely static build-up.
However, it happens whether there is dry or humid conditions and it is always only the left ear piece. I believe there is likely some strange defect or malfunction, and that causes me to get zapped when the metal does in fact touch my ear. I have since bought a cheap pair of metal ear buds from WalMart for less then half the price, which haven't shocked me once (even in the winter dryness with a space heater next to my chair). Been using the WalMart pair for over two months with no problems and the sound quality is just as good.

Don't waste your money on these. Over-priced for something that isn't any better than a $5 pair and causes physical pain.

author: MSpice
title: as advertised
content: as advertised

author: Eve Greydanus
title: Great for listening, not so good for talking.
content: The sound quality itself is very good. As is the noise cancellation and comfort. They look nice as well and it comes with a little nifty bag to keep them safe in! The one thing I dislike is that the microphone isn’t very good. The sound is muffled when recording with it.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Ok quality, but has problems
content:
I like the style and the quality is good but buyer be warned: the cord will never straighten out. It always has some kind of curl. Also if you use them for too long, one of the bud slowly goes silent.

Edit: Back fell off one of the ear buds.

author: Kilbarchan
title: Excellent Value! Excellent Sound! Bought two and zero regrets.
content: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED FOR TETHERED HEADPHONES!  Great sound quality at an excellent price. Bought one then a second for my wife.

author: Roses6965
title: Decent headphones
content: This look very cool and the sound quality is great, only issue is some people have said they have a hard time hearing me when I am having a phone conversation.

author: C. Allen
title: Great sound durable, nice case too!
content: The sound is great and they are durable metal. I liked them so much I bought 3 and gave one to my wife. Anything I've broken in the passed would have broken a yr ago. The only reason I've every had to replace them was when I lost them. I haven't broken a set yet and my first pair was bought 3 years ago.

author: kristen
title: Very loud but won’t stay in your ears
content:
These are probably one of the loudest headphones I’ve ever used which was exactly why I got them. As exciting as that was they would fall out constantly even just by turning my head the wrong way. You luckily can try using different earbuds but that requires you to purchase a set of earbuds that make or may not fit.

I understand everyone’s ears are different but there’s no way this stay in people’s ears without trying to jam them in and even that doesn’t work.

With all that being said these are not good for working out/running but the loudness is so nice they’re okay to use on a nice walk.

author: Y. Scott
title: Sound gets loud and quiet for no reason
content: The set looks great and sound is not bad. However, the sound control is awful. The volume gets loud and quiet without my touch. I can't control the volume at all. It's so annoying that I stopped using it the very first day. What a waste of money!

author: Omar D.
title: It looks very good
content: The headphones have a 4 pole audio jack connector so it works good on modern audio devices like tables, smartphones and laptops but the sound has some problems with my old Nokia 1100 so in order to use the headphones with old devices the audio connector must be connected to a stereo to mono adaptor.

author: TFH
title: Great buy
content: I use when listening to videos, music and movies.

author: Ökevnar DrewEvnov
title: Exelent sound and base
content: Wonderful! Just the best; they are durable and the sound comes out just crisply, they came with a kind of memory foam type earbud replacement part. Extremely comfortable. Couldn't have asked for anything better, especially with such a price. Brittish engineering, an exception of quality.

author: gamer214
title: 1 ear losing volume
content: After a while one ear is starting to die. I only use these at home on my pc I never dropped them and dont use them at high volumes.

author: G. Hunter
title: pulled apart in a day!
content: Pretty poorly built.  It sounded good and looked good, but it broke in a day.  I am thinking that the stress relief near the volume control is either non-existent or might as well be.  The cord got pulled on about as hard as you might pull on some dental floss getting it out of the package.  It came away just about as easy.

author: Cosmic Tea
title: Quality perfect. Staying in ears ... not really
content: These earbuds at some of the best I have received.  The noise quality how loud it can get . Yes yes yes. But ... These earbuds kept sleeping out of my ears. Even when I changed the head to bigger cushions they still kept slipping so I couldn't work out or even walk that much. But I'm telling you these earbuds are still amazing

author: Jamie
title: Amazing for the price
content: Amazing for the price and very tough. Mine have lasted through all sorts of accidental abuse and still work great. Comes with multiple sizes of earbud coverings and the outside coating of the cord makes for easier untangling. Definitely would recommend!

author: David W. Angle
title: Quality, well-made headphones
content: I purchased these to replace a cheap set of headphones that had been a giveaway at a conference. The cheap ones soon crapped out. The Betron set is well-constructed and comes with a nice carrying pouch, three sets of extra earbuds of varying sizes and a cool little clip that allows you to clip the cord to your clothing for the purpose of keeping the cord free of entanglement. The headphones also have a set of controls on the cord for volume, pause, and other features that can be used with a smart phone. I would highly recommend Betron headphones to anyone.

author: S. Haggerty
title: FAILED in 4 month
content: these worked well and feel sturdy but the connections failed just 4 months.. too late to get a return,  sucks~!  don't buy

author: Punkerz88
title: Great sound & comfortable for long periods
content: Best headphones I've ever had, durable and I have really tiny ear holes so the memory foam ones are great. I just squeeze them a bit before putting them in my ears like you would with foam earplugs and they fit right in there without falling out. I wear them for hours at a time and no pain.

author: joel
title: Headphones turn down volume automatically. Broken after 1 month.
content: Not happy with these headphones. After a month of light use, the volume adjustment buttons on the headphones do not work properly. The 'volume down' button is somehow broken, and the volume continuously turns down on it's own... not able to use these anymore. Basically a waste of money.

author: Ruby
title: Tunnel sound
content: Sound isn’t that good, I got these for a school project and I need them desperately. So Im making due. But it sounds like a tunnel.

author: TnT
title: Wow!
content:
For the price these things are really good! I used to buy more high end ear buds but will not be doing that any more.
These have really good bass when turned up louder. The bass isn't as overwhelming when the volume is low.
I like bass so it works for me. The controls on the cord are responsive and convenient as well.
Came with many variations of replacement and sized rubber ends to the buds. The cord is also a very slick rubberized coating that helps to keep them from tangling. Nice clip included also to keep you from tugging them from your ears when being active.

author: FHWC
title: Top of the line, period!
content:
Had this headphone for over an month and they are indeed the best quality earbuds ever. This seems to be a family opened & operated business that is concerned with the product that their selling.
Much Respect for the craftsmanship!

author: Riley Ulven
title: But something else
content: These headphones are bad. The sound quality is not any better than other earbuds at this price range. There’s some popping and a flat sound. Most frustrating, occasionally I hear a pop and then the volume is lowered one or several volume levels. It’s makes it impossible to go running, as the volume just keeps decreasing. Doesn’t happen with any other headphones I own. Lastly, the sound from these can be heard from other people way to easily. Like at a low volume I can the person next to me can hear my music. Other headphones are better at reducing that.

author: Hollywood Atlanta
title: Did Not Work in Samsung S7 phone
content:
I bought this product to work with my cell phone Samsung S7 gold edition.  the product did not work. i tired to wiggle the cord and nothing work.  product did not work when it arrive. being that I'm out of town a lot I miss the window to return this product to the seller.

Review other products!

author: Annamarie Door
title: All was as expected
content: No complaints. Item arrived in good time and in good order. The price was great and the item works as expected.

author: William M Neff
title: Good Headphones
content: Nice basic headphones.  This my second pair to replace a pair I lost.

author: Mark Daniels
title: Super durable
content: A pretty good buy. I accidentally washed these in my laundry and they still worked! I dropped them while riding my bike, and pulled the wire pretty hard once and they still worked. Very durable and came on time. Sound quality is pretty good.

author: David F. White
title: None
content: Great headphones

author: easywriter
title: Earbud
content: Nice units. So many to pick from and I have been buying the $5 ones and they last a week and the sound quality was weak. These have lasted and are comfortable. Good sound

author: Joy C. Andrews
title: Best I've found.  Probably used 3 sets in this series in the last year or two.
content:
Not indestructible by any means, but certainly better then most.  Will definitely take a beating but eventually they seem to wear out at the earpiece connection, dropping one channel.  A look at strain relief might be beneficial in the design, but would add to the price.

Also better sound then most I've tried in this price point.

author: Zryder
title: Left ear bud doesnt work.
content: The left earbud stopped working out side of the return date.

author: Maryj
title: Like them so much..... bought an extra
content:
Really good price for such a cool set of headphones.  You can use them on your phone, your Ipad etc.
Love them!

author: Thomas V Jacques
title: Dont hesitate BUY these! You will Thank me!
content: Quick delivery, nicely packaged! Good start. These earbuds are too good to only be $11.99! The sound is excellent. 1st pair of earbuds Ive had that actually noise cancelling. Turn them up you cant hear anyone or anything around you. So far SOOOOO GOOD! Make sure to use the memory foam ear buds!

author: Tricia
title: Broke after two months
content: This product no longer works. I barely used them, and now the volume is so quiet when I listen, and cuts in and out. Poor quality product, spend your money elsewhere.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great ear bud set
content: A little bit on the pricey side in comparison to some others that are similar but again you get what you pay for and I think that this particular said I got was well worth the extra $10 because I love my music to be very clear with base without having distortion and the noise cancellation works very very well

author: Alicia
title: Great headphones, poor earbuds
content:
I have been using these earbuds for approximately 1 month now with the included memory foam earbuds. Unfortunately one of the earbuds cracked after merely 1 month of regular use (either sitting at my desk, or transported in the included carrying case). After reaching out to customer support, they said that the warranty did not cover earbuds and that they don't sell earbuds separately. They did direct me to another vendor for replacement memory foam earbuds, but weren't able to help replace my broken earbud.

Overall, I found the sound quality very good, and was pleasantly surprised that they included a carrying pouch for the headphones, and 4 sets of earbuds with the purchase (3 sets of regular earbuds, small, medium, and large, as well as a memory foam set).  For the price of the headphones, I would say it was still a worthwhile purchase, I was just disappointed with the durability of the memory foam earbuds, especially since those were my favorite fit.

author: Reggi R
title: Quality of merchandise
content: It has developed a short and it is still very new.  When I talk on them, people  say there is an "echo".  Can these be replaced?

author: Farhad
title: Awesome headphones
content: Awesome headphones and sounds quality it's awesome and the bass quality perfect

author: Jtipp
title: Best bang for the buck
content: These are some of the absolute best headphones I've ever owned and that's saying something! It amazes me how great this product is with such a low price. I have 2 pairs of these headphones: one I keep at the office and one I keep in my car.  The soft foam tips are the added bonus because they meld to to fit the crevices of your ear like ear plugs do.

author: Frederick S. Lyon
title: Very decent headphone
content: Would order again but the price has been raised substantially.

author: antonio
title: They Feel and look nice
content: I liked the look and feel of these headphones disliked that about 3 months later one of the speakers went out I had cheaper headphone speakers last a little longer

author: Nikki Barnes
title: Great performing earphones
content: These earphones are a great product for its price point. I love the quality of sound that comes through that I wear them all night, every night listening to my podcasts or music to pull me to sleep. And the added bass is noticeable.

author: Wood
title: Buy only if you have an EQ
content: Out-of-the-box, these sound like a pair of $10 headphones. The initial sound is hollow, muffled, and cheap. However, with optimum equalization they sound really good. For Android, I use a paid app called Poweramp which provides granular controls over the EQ and works really well with bringing these to life. The construction of the headphones appear solid – time will tell how they hold up. Bottom line, if you don’t have an EQ I would not recommend buying these, but if you do, you’ll love them.

author: Le
title: Great price, awesome sound.
content: So far so good. I have had them about 3 days now & the quality is good. The bass is really good and the buttons work! The people on the other end can hear me just like talking on the phone regular. I love the gold and black color with red entwined into it. My kids have tugged them out of my ears a few times already and they havent broken. Good earphones for a great price.

author: Daisy Byars
title: So far so good-update
content:
Upon opening the package, I LOVED the quality of everything. The box was nice. And in this case, first impressions really do matter. I was pleased with everything. The headphones were snug inside their protective casing. They also came with a lot of extra stuff, for example they came with different sizes of earpieces as well as some that are memory foam. I am thankful for this additive. They also came with what I assume is a carrying pouch. The material is nice, and is also of really good quality.
The sound quality of the headphones is overall really well. My last headphones were skull candies and I like these a lot better.
The overall quality of the headphones is nice. They are durable, but still feel delicate and nice to hold. The cord doesn't feel cheap.
As far as durability goes, I will update my review when I see that they stop working, but for now I will put them to the test of the everyday college student.
#GoHeels #UNCChapelHill22

Just an update, these headphones are still working strong. I still love the quality and they have taken a couple of hard drops but have no damage and are still working fine! They are very durable and I am so happy with this purchase. Sound quality is great, but I have discovered the quality depends on the device you are using. My phone quality (or equalizer settings) are a lot better than my laptop.

author: William Locke
title: Keeper
content: Love everything except the the gold bling

author: mark g
title: Ugly, but sound ok.
content: These headphones are actually quite ugly in person. The sound is decent, though, for a cheap pair of earbuds.

author: Richard B
title: Great value
content: Very comfortable and sound great

author: Gary Bashor
title: Full, natural sound!
content:
Really nice quality headset at an amazing price point. Non-tangle wires and solid construction. Some of the nicest sound I have found - and really comfortable.

The only negative and it’s not enough to drop a star, is Ike almost every other in-ear bud, they tend to come out with much activity. An optional ear-loop would be nice.

Would easily recommend these over most I’ve tried!

I haven’t had long enough to really rate durability, but they are better construction than most I own.

author: Andrew O Asiedu
title: Excellent for the price
content: These headphones won't change the way you hear music, they won't break new ground with your audio but for the price they are excellent. Excellent clarity, reduced interference... Just make sure you select a bud that fits (Only drawback... The rubber on the buds is a tad hard) as such finding the right size is paramount.

author: Rphill
title: Amazing for the price
content:
This is my second set.  After over a year I lost mine in a restaurant.  Must have fallen out of my pocket.  I bought a different set at the same price point and then I realized why I love these so much.  The similarly priced set was terrible.... I immediately another pair of these to replace it.  So glad I did.

update:
after less than two months of use the right side earbud stopped working.  just put them on today and ive only got one side  very disappointing as my last set lasted until i lost them.  this pair did always have a very mild buzz and the quality seems to be more in line with other products at its price point than the first pair i had.  disappointed.

author: Sam W.
title: Too big ..
content: We bought these earbuds but they were too big for our ears. We tried to insert them forcefully into our ears, thinking maybe later we can get used to the size, but after a couple of minutes, our ears were hurting. We wish their size was smaller like other earbuds in the market. Their problem was that they were uncomfortable, and would fall off due to their large size, so we had to return them.

author: Gene Smith-James
title: Great product. UPS is the spawn of hell.
content:
Great product - the price is right for these super durable, super cheap for the great sound quality they give too. If anything, they're a bit heavy on the bass, but you can fix that if you care enough, and I mostly listen to funk anyways so it doesn't bother me. This is just an alert to not ship this via UPS if you can help it. Package got delayed twice - once due to weather in a city with blue skies and sunshine, and again where it sat in a warehouse for a week for no specific reason, and finally came to my stoop two weeks after I bought it with the box absolutely ripped to shreds, and a small, mini-version of the box these typically come in without the foam earbuds I was hoping for, for some reason, was inside. I seriously recommend these buds - I've used some other models of theirs too and they're also good, this is just my fav - but UPS can suck me till I'm dry.

In conclusion, they're a great buy, but avoid UPS like the plague. Would've liked those foam tips that they came with the other times I bought em though...

author: Dv
title: for less than $14.00 these are amazing headphones
content: These headphones are extremely loud and have  excellent base. I listen to a lot of EDM: Dubstep, Trap, Hardstyle and these genres of music sound so great on these headphones. As a warning try them down low before turning them up because they get SUPER loud.

author: Staci Goddard
title: Made by Angels
content: Where have these been all my life!?  I had no idea the sound quality out of ear buds were going to rock my world.  How did this happen?  I almost want to buy 80 of them and squirrel them in a secret capsule so that I have a lifetime stash and some extras for my progeny.

author: Hoosain
title: Very well packaged and includes a nice little bag to store the earbuds in
content: Very well packaged and includes a nice little bag to store the earbuds in. Sound quality is excellent! Very impressive indeed. I am by no means an audiophile but the sound to me is really good. Listened to it on a Samsung S7 Edge. Unfortunately it wont work with my cover on the phone as the jack does not go all the way in. With cover off works a charm. Would definitely recommend these. Also comes with additional earbuds as I needed a smaller size so that worked out well too. Fits quite comfortably. Build quality is very good too.

author: Marklin
title: nice look & sound; failed after 3 months
content: loved the look and sound performance from these. but they only lasted 3 months. i used them about an hour commuting every other day. they just started randomly increasing volume, and randomly pausing playback on my iPhone. the problem seems to be where the wire comes out of the metal jack. i know it’s not my phone because i wasn’t able to duplicate this behavior with the white Apple earbuds the phone came with. disappointed with the durability here, would not recommend. :(

author: Cavell A.
title: Terrible fit and very heavy
content:
The build quality is decent, the fit is horrible unless you have a huge ear canal using the different tips are useless, if you manage to get them in the weight will definitely make them drop out.
It's tuned to deliver bass so much you barely hear any words.

author: Shawn L Pearson
title: Very, very good, especially at this price point
content:
The sound quality is very good, the build is solid, and appearance is above par. My 17 year old son has had them now for several months, and hasn't lost or broken them yet, which is quite a miracle.

Edit: Four months later and they are still the best earbuds I've ever purchased. I have several highly rated, extremely expensive sets, and these are still the best sounding and sturdiest yet.

author: Alyssa z
content: I love them but they easily break

author: John W. Reeder
title: Good value
content: Surprisingly good sound considering the price. Took a while before I could use them because I lost the 3.5mm adapter (and Beats earphones that were attached to it) with DAC that my phone requires. Currently using the Google USB-C digital to 3.5mm adapter on an Essential PH-1. Solid but not overpowering or muddy bass, crisp highs. Comes with a storage pouch, several additional seals including a foam one (nice!) and a clip to attach the cord to your collar or whatever.

author: Thackary
title: Sound is good, but they are almost too lightweight
content: Sound quality is great, and the headphones look really classy. However, they are soooooo lightweight that even the tinniest pull of the cord or knock at the earphones and they fall out of my ears, and I have small ears and am using the foam tips so I figure they should be fitting super snugly in my ears and not fall out so easily. Sometimes just moving my head a little bit or leaning back causes them to fall out. Thankfully I just use them at home while sitting at my desk so this isn't a huge hassle. I sometimes work out at home, but haven't tried them out for that yet. I can't imagine trying to use them while walking, running, or working out though...they'd probably fall out every 30 seconds if not more often. But otherwise I really like them. Only real downside when I opened them was there was no L/R lettering to indicate which side was right and left. I just went by the graphic of them being worn by someone on the manual and am using the side with the control buttons on the cord in the right side.

author: Briana R
title: Stopped working
content: These are great headphones until they stop working. I've bought two pairs and I thought that maybe the first pair were defective but then I had the same problem with my second pair. So needless to say as much as I love these headphones I won't buy these again. It's just too expensive to keep buying these headphones.

author: Big Nest.
title: headphones
content: Good headphones very clear and bass driven good product the only glitch is a bit heavy when it sits in ear..

author: Kayla C.
title: Right earbud gave out after a few days
content: Last time I ordered this product, it lasted a good 8 months. That's why I decided to order them again. But this time, after a few days of usage, the right earbud seemed to give out. I am not very pleased. I guess it was a defective set but aside from this Betron is a great brand.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Dont buy cheap headphones.
content: They worked great for a while, (awhile in cheap head phone world is about 3 weeks)and then they crapped out on me.  you get what you pay for.  Honestly it looks like they spend more time and money on the packaging than the head phones. PS im keeping the box, lol.  Advice, spend the 30-60 bucks and get a pair that works for at least a year.  I think 1 year is about you can expect from anything from amazon.

author: Paul D. Calabrese
title: They fit comfortable in your ears
content: These ear buds are worthy getting.  The bass and treble responses are deep and clean.  They fit comfortable in your ears.  I bought these because the AKG ones that came with my Samsung S9 plus......in one two words....absolutely sucked! They were awful sounding even with trying to tune them with Samsung's included software on the phone. So if you are unhappy with your current ear buds get these and you will NOT go wrong.

author: Radioraisedme
title: Wrost headphones
content: Wrost headphones sounds like people are singing in tin cans

author: Angel T.
title: Good
content: Great sound. The end needed to be smaller to fit into the smartphone with the case on. I did a little filing down then it fit.

author: Pooh
title: Sound is Crisp
content: The sound on these are crisp.  I primary use my set for mobile device phone calls and have not had any problems being heard or hearing my end user.

author: James
title: Price to value is amazing.
content: Excellent headphones. Use them any time I want to block out the outside world. Sound quality is very good and they are extremely comfortable. Just purchased a second set for my wife for an upcoming flight.

author: English Rose
title: The only pair that still works.
content: Good sound quality and well made. This is the only pair i have left, so they are durable.

author: Miguel Angel
title: Calidad
content: Bastante bonitos y sonido perfecto

author: Sandy C.
title: You won’t be disappointed
content:
Sound is a wee bit muffled but that’s the noise cancelling doing its job!

Took a huge gamble on the aesthics other these headphones. I’ve been rebuying the OEM Apple headphones for years and became used to having a mic, volume rocker and start pause capabilities built into a nice simple unit.

These headphones definitely deliver and I absolutely love how unique they look!

I wear a ton of silver jewelry and the gold and metal tones compliment my outfits everyday.

author: Bert Kornyei
title: Good headphones, but not so durable
content: Great sound and looks, but the plug in connection broke within a couple of months. I used it at home on my computer and for traveling. Too bad it is not more durable.

author: CustomerXYZ
title: Attractive & good value
content: The sound is fairly crisp and I like the overall looks. They include lots of extra earpieces and they are worth the $. I do wish the mic had a mute function as well- that's something missing from a lot of other earbuds as well.

author: CCC
title: Solid and great quality
content: I like to listen to books and purchased these headphones for that reason.  Does not seem to be a right vs left, but there is one black and one red stripe per ear bud designation. Sound is clear, and the set is solid not flimsy.  I used the buds as mailed and found them uncomfortable. I believe the round rubber pieces were to big for my ear canals, so next book I will try the smaller silicone pieces included in delivery.  Great quality especially for the price.

author: Wesley Lant

author: TS
title: Pretty Good
content: I replaced my Sony  earphones with Betron. I did have to get used to the difference. I do wish the bass was heavier other than that I am happy with my purchase.

author: Christopher Brehm
title: Great sound quality
content: These are the best earbuds I've ever had. The sound quality is excellent. I love the cord coating that doesn't get tangled. All of the materials used has the feel of high quality.

author: Kelly U.
title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT & SOUND QUALITY!
content: Excellent headphones; great price. Very happy with this purchase. So far so good, we will see how they last over the long run.

author: Parker
title: great for the price
content: I like in ear headphones for bassier stuff and these definitely get the job done. not the best headphones in the world but good for more digital stuff like electronic/hip-hop/pop/bassy music. plus it's kinda hard to beat the price they're at.

author: Brooke Buglino
title: Headphones
content: Love them

author: Machlan
title: Just what I wanted
content: These are great quality for the price. I am gentle with them - and store them in the pouch they were sent in. They arrived without any defects and are still as nice as the day I got them after a few weeks of regular use. The sound quality is nice, they feel more expensive than they are. The in-line mic works great too. They're much nicer than my Apple ones I used to use, as well as half the price.

author: Neeraj
title: Keeps falling off!!
content: While the sound quality is ok, have a hard time keeping it plugged due to the metal weight. Keeps falling off. Even the noise cancellation is really not good. When you plug in and walk around talking, there is this annoying thumping sound in the ears. Wont recommend at all.

author: Drew Panyko
title: Best Value
content: I never heard of this brand until I researched "best ear buds for the money" online.  After reading a nice write up on an independent site, I found these on sale at Amazon and ordered them.  I've been using these for a few weeks now and can't recommend them highly enough.  One can tell just by handling these that the quality is far superior than even more expensive ear buds; these are built to last.  The wires are tangle-free, they fit comfortably, and (most importantly) the sound is incredible.  Given the price on Amazon, you have nothing to lose and so much to gain by purchasing these.  Do yourself a favor and get a pair!  You'll be so glad you did.  After years of buying and using disposable ear buds, I've finally found my go-to brand.  Thank you, Betron!

author: Bianca Luna
title: GREAT... until they broke
content: These earbuds were a DREAM. They had the button controls I was used to, noise-cancelling, comfort, and amazing sound quality. For the price, it seemed way too good to be true. The quality never diminished, and for a few months I was using these everyday. However, these suddenly stopped working one day. It seems like a problem with BOTH the cord and/or the button player. Plugging the headphones in just entails a static noise and it constantly pauses, changes the volume of, restarts, or skips songs. It got too unbearable that I just had to scrap these. And I couldn’t file these with the warranty because you can’t claim it if it has damage involving the cord! Sad to say that I wasn’t even rough with these at all, and my Apple earbuds lasted longer (which says a lot, as those usually break on me after a short amount of time.) Had super high hopes, but dissappointed in the end. I’ll have to find a new pair now.

author: Michael L.
title: Good back up ear buds
content: Bought these cause always like trying new earbuds and was recommended to me by Amazon. Description and reviews looked great, really liked the emphasis on bass as that's one thing I do look for. After receiving these and using them for a week put them as my backups, pretty disappointed in them. Sound quality is sub par, really bright highs and bass is nonexistent, idk why others say it's great. For the price though they are ok for when needed, but honestly the creative ep 630 is cheaper and sound so much better then these. Will not buy again and wouldnt recommend

author: Anne
title: Broke after 3 weeks
content: The sound quality was pretty average, no better or worse than your run-of-the-mill $10 pair at a drugstore. I was very disappointed when after two weeks the right earbud had no sound and one more week later the left was so static-sounding that they were absolutely unusable.

author: RW

content: Comfort, durable & sound is what I like about the headphones. I sleep with my headphones on, so durability is what I need. The sound is amazing coming from the headphones.

author: Tina

author: Bryan Davis

author: Mason Ray Witt
title: Great for price
content: Normally I'm a skullcandy ink'd guy. But holy smokes these are some really really good ear buds. I love the design and build. And for the price it's really hard to get a better deal. POWERFUL bass too. Not like a fuzzy bass either. It's strong and clear. Exactly what I was looking for. I Will order again

author: Anna R.
title: Great quality
content: These headphones are excellent, especially for the price. They look super cool and high and and they sound great too. The carrying pouch they came with is a nice bonus.

author: Amazon Customer
title: sound
content: Can not beat for price Personally would prefer placement of volume control closer to jack. Good clarity

author: Aaron Hazouri
title: Painful to have in your ears for any period of time (my ears, anyway)
content: Maybe I have small ears or something, but the design of these things is so painful (the hard edged back end, not the speaker end) that I had to stop using them after just a couple days. I didn't throw them away but I might as well have since I consigned them to the junk drawer. Sound quality was okay - not any better than my cheap old earbuds (which I went back to after my newfound appreciation for how comfortable they are). Would not buy these again and have actively discouraged a couple friends from buying them. Maybe I'm wearing them wrong. I dunno!

author: alkapwn
title: Do not get these if you are planning to use them at the gym
content: I've noticed that a couple other reviewers who left similar poor ratings have had the same problem as I did: the earphones shocking their ears and the same shock inputting unwanted volume control commands into my iphone, i.e. when I'm working out, the sound arbitrarily decreases on my phone as the slider is set to the minimum setting. author: Edgar

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great sound
content: I like the sound once I found the perfect ear bud size unfortunately it didn’t come with the sizes sent with the ear phones. I actually stole a set from a different pair I had, such is the life of someone with tiny ears lol. But once that got worked out the bass was amazing!

author: Amazon Customer

author: Miguel Reynoso
title: Great price, great quality.
content: The quality of the product does not reflect it's price, which is a good thing. The pricing for these are very affordable, yet they don't feel and don't sound cheap, I haven't owned any earbuds such as these in a few years, so I can't compare them to others as I've always bought apple earphones, but I can say that these are a good replacement for me and I will definitely be buying more from them in the future.

author: Ken Ponder
title: Great Earbuds for the $$
content: I have had many pairs of earbuds and these are well made and sound awesome. I wear them while on a lawn tractor and they cut out the noise and all I hear is great music.

author: Krys
title: Pretty good
content: Really good earphones! I compared it to my friend’s $100 earphones and couldn't hear a difference. Unfortunately, it started making a weird pulsing feeling on my left ear but it doesn’t bother me that much when I am listening to music. Really enjoy them for the price

author: JimBo
title: Quality as high as more expensive earphones at a much lower cost
content: I have a pair of headphones that cost $80. These sound very much like them, and I paid $14.50. This is a sign of a revolution in earbud quality. author: Amazon Customer
title: Mine broke after using for only 1.5 months! :(
content:
Sadly mine broke after using for only 1.5 months. I contacted seller but no answer either. Sound was pretty good for its price but it was a waste of money as now I have to purchase another earphones.

author: BigDaddy65
title: Very Impressive Construction and Performance
content: Upon receipt, I am very impressed with these earbuds! The sound is clear with even response and not too much bass, also quite efficient for good volume range.  All of the components seem high quality and rugged; cord, buds, plug, control.  I have been through a lot of well-known earbuds for far more money that failed but I anticipate better performance from these Betron YSM1000 headphones.

author: Carl M Hawken
title: Cheap, horrible sounding earbuds that don't work.
content:
Received these earbuds with high expectations, was totally disappointed.

First, no sound came out of them when I connected to my Samsung Galaxy Note 4.  According to the specs, they are suppose to work with ALL Samsung phones.  I played and played with them and found that you had to depress the talk button on them to hear anything.  What good are earbuds if you have to hold a button down constantly.  I found a work around, the apparel clip that comes with the earbuds I clipped to the talk button to keep it depressed.

Second, the sound quality was horrible.  It sounded like I was listening to my music in a tin can.  The bass was almost non existent and the highs were extremely tinny.  I have a pair of earbuds that came with a $15.00 Chinese MP3 player, very very basic cheap earbuds, but they are far superior to the Betron earbuds.  These earbuds arrived in a cheap paper box, like you would get from a jewelry store to put the ring box into.  The earbuds were in a ziplock bag in the box.

Third, I contacted their customer support and after sending photo's of the earbuds, they acknowledged that I had received a pair of counterfeit earbuds - stating that their earbuds have their logo on them and that they come in a nice container with their logo on them.  Customer service apologized for what I received and stated that they were going to notify Amazon about counterfeit's being shipped.  They also stated that they would immediately ship me a real pair.

Fourth, 2 weeks later I still have not received the replacements and when I wrote to customer service they said it wasn't their problem.  Amazon shipped them so I had to deal with Amazon.  2 weeks ago they couldn't apologize enough and promised to fix the situation and now it isn't their responsibility.

Horrible sounding earbuds, counterfeit (as admitted by Betron), and no customer support.  Beware buying these earbuds.  If you like tinny music with no base and walking around holding a button to even get sound out of them and spending a lot of money for that, then these are the ones to get.  If you want a quality earbud then don't buy Betron, they don't care about their product.

author: Randol Batts
title: Good buy
content: For how cheap they are they are very good. Very good material quality. Very durable, as far as headphones go.

author: LBG23
title: Great headphones, amazing value!!
content: Bought one pair for my picky son and he loved them and then bought 3 more for all my kids and a backup.  Amazing, especially for the price!!!

author: joe doll
title: Very pleased. Great Sound and Quality
content:
i was looking for good quality sounding set of "wired" earbuds for a long flight.  I did Not want wireless ones because i didn't want to worry about trying to crawl around on floor of an airplane if I accidenty dropped one.  I've always been a bit of a snob when it comes to music quality and was an amateur musician for years and been in recording studio.  Keeping things in perspective I don't expect to get studio quality sound from ANY earbuds, wired or wireless, because they are afterall earbuds.  Having said that,  the sound quality is very good and the bass is punchy,  not muddy.  The stereo sound articulation between the individual earbuds is great.  I even plugged 2 sets of these into a Y splitter on my cell phone jack to watch movies with my wife on flights without any notice of loss of volume.
I'm very satisfied, pleasantly surprised from the sound quality.  They do feel like quality materials and made well including the wire which feels thicker than standard wired earbuds.  Not sure if this is due to a thicker guage wire, casing,  or both.  I always keep my earbuds in a small empty hard hair product case with screw top lid when not in use to protect them in my laptop bag from damage so I expect to have these for a long time.  I ordered 2 pairs of these and recommended them without reservation.  I can't imagine you will find anything close to this quality of material or sound at this price point (or probably even higher).

They are nice too look at, and they will fool you thinking they are going to sound great, but I should have spent my money on Sony extra bass. One of the perfect wired headphones in my opinion.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Anyone remember Full Metal Jacket Headphones from SK? Theses are like that... but for $20
content: Seriously pretty amazed by the quality of these headphones. Clear sound, foam buds do a great job with noise cancellation, and they are hefty and substantial. Cannot be more pleased with them, especially at the price.

author: Nina
title: great company,  horrible product
content: The day these arrived, one of the earbuds fell apart. On top of that, the sound was bad & the earbuds were so big they wouldn't stay in my ears. My reason for the stars is for the company,  not the product. They were great & didn't give me a hassle about returning  & were prompt in their refund.

author: charles s johnson
title: I love the technology but it was cumbersome to run with them as a female.
content:
I just the purchase the earphone and went running with them the next day. I gave 4 stars but if there was a rating for comfort, I would have rated it a 2. I am a female and the earbuds were still too big to stay in my ear. The ability to adjust the sound volume on the microphone is an excellent idea, and that is why I purchased them, but it made that side of the ear phones too heavy and earbuds kept falling out of my ear. I tried using the clip that came with it and a safety pin, that I had with me, to tie the cords to my shirt and nothing worked. I lost so much of my running time stopping and trying to fine a solution to keep them in my ear that I final gave up and walked my 3 miles. I still like them so I told my husband that they would use them to work out with weights but I wouldn't use them for my runs .
I will stick to the other "wood" brand I have purchased on amazon that I would rate as a 5 star in every area for females with small ear canals.

author: William
title: Amazing quality, but very low sturdiness..
content: I was impressed with the quality and wow loud they were when I first received them. But only about two weeks of light use, the right earbud began to give out. I was very displeased. I recommend that Betron touches up on the sturdiness of this product and make it truly last longer. I will only buy from this company again once they have touched up on their product and have improved it.
